title: Hurricane Milton Wreaks Havoc on Tropicana Field
content: For the first time in five seasons, the Tampa Bay Rays find themselves out of the postseason, but the timing might be a small relief as Florida contends with the devastation of Hurricane Milton. Initially categorized as a Category 5 hurricane, Milton was downgraded to a Category 3 by Wednesday evening. According to USA Today, the storm made landfall about 70 miles south of Tampa, prompting warnings from the National Hurricane Center of an "extremely life-threatening situation." As the hurricane sweeps through Florida, the damage has already begun. Social media user David Moore, who appears to be staying close to the stadium, posted a video on his X account, showcasing the destructive winds and rain that have significantly impacted Tropicana Field, home of the Rays. The view from our window as we ride out the storm. The roof of Tropicana Field is destroyed by the winds of #HurricaneMilton . Praying for Tampa Bay and all areas affected. Stay safe, everyone," Moore wrote. The view from our window as we ride out the storm. The roof of Tropicana Field is destroyed by the winds of #HurricaneMilton . Praying for Tampa Bay and all areas affected. Stay safe, everyone pic.twitter.com/uy0aNGMAuJ Several other videos from another user, Bill Carl Johnson, revealed even further damage, where possibly half of the roof, had been torn off, exposing the stadium’s interior to the elements. "It keeps getting worse," Johnson wrote. It keeps getting worse pic.twitter.com/OCwaxAiDmY Tropicana...

title: Keep the Nine Colors of Navratri in Your Home Decor Forever
content: Navratri is a festival that goes beyond devotion and spirituality—it’s a celebration of color, culture, and vibrant energies. Each day of the nine-day festival is associated with a specific color, symbolizing different forms of Goddess Durga. While these colors are often worn as part of traditional clothing during the festivities, why not introduce them into your home decor and keep the spirit of Navratri alive throughout the year? Incorporating the nine Navratri colors into your living space can create an environment filled with joy, positivity, and balance. With insights from Yashna Garg, founder, Y Designs Impressions, and Aashish Khandelwal, founder and Interior Designer, Hanumant Design, here’s how you can weave the essence of these colors into your home decor, ensuring that the festive vibrancy stays with you all year round. Khandelwal adds that incorporating orange cushions, throws, or lampshades can create a cozy, welcoming ambiance in your home, giving it a lively, festive feel all year long. Khandelwal suggests using white furniture or decor to brighten and open up your living space. The simplicity of white allows for a feeling of purity and peace, perfect for bedrooms and living areas where relaxation is key. Similarly, Khandelwal advocates for red accents to make a bold statement. Whether it’s a red sofa or bold artwork, red adds drama and strength, perfect for living rooms or dining areas where energy and excitement are welcome. Khandelwal highlights how royal...

title: ICSI CS December 2024 Registration Without Late Fee Process To End Today; Check Application Fee Here
content: ICSI CS December 2024: The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) will close registration for the Company Secretary (CS) December 2024 executive and professional test today, October 10. The exam is set for December 21-30. Eligible candidates may apply for the ICSI CS December 2024 application form by going to the official website, icsi.edu. The late registration period will begin tomorrow, October 11, and run until October 15. The institute will open the application correction window on November 20, 2024. During this time, students can change their exam centre, module, medium, or optional subject, revoke exemption requests, and resubmit papers for exemptions based on better qualifications. Also Read:- UCMS Junior Assistant Registration Date Extended Till October 12; Check Application Fee Here The institute stated that paper-wise exemptions based on 60% marks in the June 2024 tests will be provided automatically. Students who do not intend to use the exemption may request it be cancelled. The deadline for filing exemption cancellation or resubmitting materials for the December session is November 20, 2024. According to the official notification, students who choose the foreign centre in Dubai must pay a surcharge of USD 100 or its equivalent in Indian rupees, i.e. Rs 8,396 in addition to the professional programme's examination price. ICSI CS December 2024: Application fee Applicants can find the application fee for the ICSI CS December 2024 tests in the table...

title: MLB季後賽》大聯盟放行打秋聯 大都會明星二壘手復出味濃
content: 麥克尼爾有機會在國聯冠軍賽復出。(法新社) 廖志軒/核稿編輯 〔體育中心/綜合報導〕2度入選明星賽的大都會二壘手麥克尼爾(Jeff McNeil),今年9月因觸身球造成右手手腕骨折,原本高機率整季報銷,不過隨著大都會闖進國聯冠軍賽,麥克尼爾復出的機會也越來越濃厚。 《ESPN》報導指出,由於佛羅里達州的球隊春訓設施,受到颶風影響暫時無法使用,因此大都會申請讓麥克尼爾參加亞利桑那秋季聯盟,而大聯盟也准許了這項要求,麥克尼爾預計美國時間本週五、六會在秋聯亮相。 請繼續往下閱讀... 實際上今天擊敗費城人的比賽,麥克尼爾有隨隊行動,賽前還進行了內野守備、打擊訓練。 本季麥克尼爾出賽了129場,打擊率.238,另有12轟以及44分打點,受傷後鷹俠(Jose Iglesias)補上了二壘缺,例行賽22場繳出.395打擊率,季後賽6場打擊率.231,並為球隊打回3分打點。 過去曾有從亞利桑那秋季聯盟復健後,直接重返大聯盟的例子,2016年小熊奪冠賽季,明星重砲史瓦伯(Kyle Schwarber)因十字韌帶受傷幾乎整季缺席,但他成功在亞利桑那秋季聯盟登場,並且趕上世界大賽復出。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Vettaiyan: ‘ভেট্টইয়ান’ মুক্তির উদযাপনে মেতেছেন রজনীকান্তের ভক্তরা, দেখুন ভিডিও
content: নয়াদিল্লি: রজনীকান্ত অভিনীত ‘ভেট্টইয়ান’ (Vettaiyan) সিনেমাটি আজ মুক্তি পেয়েছে। ছবিতে রজনীকান্তকে (Rajinikanth) একজন পুলিশ অফিসারের ভূমিকায় দেখা গিয়েছে। টিজে জ্ঞানভেল পরিচালিত এই ছবিতে অভিনয় করেছেন অমিতাভ বচ্চনও। বহু বছর পর আবারও পর্দায় দেখা গেল রজনীকান্ত ও বিগ বি জুটিকে। ছবিটি ইতিমধ্যে দর্শকদের মধ্যে সাড়া ফেলে দিয়েছে। রজনীকান্তের ভক্তরা চেন্নাইয়ের রোহিণী থিয়েটারের (Rohini Theatre) বাইরে 'ভেট্টাইয়ান' সিনেমার মুক্তি উদযাপন করছেন। দেখুন- #WATCH | Tamil Nadu | Fans of actor Rajinikanth celebrate the release of his film 'Vettaiyan' outside Chennai's Rohini theatre. pic.twitter.com/rgbvVhrter — TIMES NOW (@TimesNow) October 10, 2024 ভেট্টাইয়ান দেখতে দর্শকদের ভিড়- 4 மணி காட்சிக்கு குடுபத்தோடு வருவதெல்லாம் தலைவனுக்கே சாத்தியம் #Vettayain #SuperstarRajinikanth #50YearsOfRajinism pic.twitter.com/6ET2xcpRDV — 🔥தீ🔥 (@RajiniGuruRG) October 9, 2024 (টুইটার, ইনস্টাগ্রাম এবং ইউটিউব সহ সোশাল মিডিয়া থেকে আপনার কাছে সর্বশেষতম ব্রেকিং নিউজ, ভাইরাল ট্রেন্ডস এবং ইনফরমেশন নিয়ে আসে SocialLY। উপরের পোস্টটি ব্যবহারকারীর সোশাল মিডিয়া অ্যাকাউন্ট থেকে সরাসরি এম্বেড করা হয়েছে এবং লেটেস্টলি এতে কোনও সংশোধন বা সম্পাদনা করেনি। সোশাল মিডিয়া পোস্টের মতামত এবং তথ্য লেটেস্টলি-র মতামতকে প্রতিফলিত করে না। লেটেস্টলি এর জন্য কোনও দায়বদ্ধতা বা দায় গ্রহণ করে না।)

title: ¿Qué pasará con la investigación a Petro que encendió la política en Colombia?
content: Paro de transportistas Dólar en Perú Dina Boluarte Accidente en Arequipa Andrés Hurtado Shakira EsSalud DNI Selección peruana Corte de agua P. Diddy Huracán Milton Miguel Grau Horóscopo ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Petro denuncia que esta investigación representa un intento de "golpe de Estado" y critica la imparcialidad del CNE, alegando cercanía de algunos magistrados a partidos de derecha. Una investigación de la autoridad electoral de Colombia contra el presidente Gustavo Petro encendió la chispa de un gran incendio que enfrenta al Ejecutivo con otras instituciones, bajo denuncias del mandatario sobre el inicio de un "golpe de Estado". La lupa del Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), un organismo administrativo, está puesta sobre los libros contables de la campaña que en 2022 llevó a Petro a ser el primer izquierdista en el poder del país. Según la investigación que se abrió el martes, él y sus aliados violaron los topes de gasto. Este es el origen y posibles consecuencias del proceso que llevó a Petro a convocar a manifestaciones para "defender" la democracia. - ¿Por qué se investiga? En febrero de 2023 llegaron al CNE denuncias anónimas sobre irregularidades en las finanzas de la campaña. A mediados de ese año estallaron dos escándalos. En junio se filtraron conversaciones telefónicas entre la mano derecha de Petro, Laura Sarabia, y su entonces...

title: '전,란' 박정민 "강동원 화려한 검술 부담..내겐 액션 감독과 같아"
செந்தில் ஸ்ரீஜா முதல் வெற்றி வைஷ்ணவி வரை; காதலில் விழுந்து கணவன், மனைவியாக மாறிய தமிழ் சீரியல் ஜோடிகள்
content: சூர்யா - ஜோதிகா, சினேகா - பிரசன்னா என சினிமாவில் ஜோடியாக நடித்து பின்னர் காதல் திருமணம் செய்துகொண்ட நடிகர், நடிகைகளை போல் சின்னத்திரையிலும் காதல் ஜோடிகள் அதிகரித்த வண்ணம் உள்ளனர். முதலில் ரீல் ஜோடிகளாக நடித்து பின்னர் ரியல் ஜோடிகள் ஆனவர்கள் சின்னத்திரையில் ஏராளம் உள்ளன. அந்த லிஸ்ட்டில் யார் யாரெல்லாம் இருக்கிறார்கள் என்பது பற்றி இந்த தொகுப்பில் பார்க்கலாம். செந்தில் - ஸ்ரீஜா சரவணன் மீனாட்சி என்கிற சீரியலை யாரும் அவ்வளவு எளிதில் மறந்திருக்க முடியாது. அதன் முதல் சீசனில் ஜோடியாக நடித்திருந்தவர்கள் தான் மிர்ச்சி செந்தில் மற்றும் ஸ்ரீஜா. அந்த சீரியல் மிகப்பெரிய அளவில் ஹிட் ஆனதற்கு இவர்கள் இருவருக்கும் இடையேயான கெமிஸ்ட்ரியும் முக்கிய காரணம். சீரியலில் கெமிஸ்ட்ரி ஒர்க் அவுட் ஆனதை போல் ரியல் லைஃபிலும் இவர்களுக்கு இடையே கெமிஸ்ட்ரி ஒர்க் அவுட் ஆனதால் இருவரும் கடந்த 2014-ம் ஆண்டு திருமணம் செய்துகொண்டனர். இவர்களுக்கு ஒரு குழந்தையும் உள்ளது. ஆல்யா மானசா - சஞ்சீவ் ராஜா ராணி என்கிற விஜய் டிவி சீரியலில் ஜோடியாக நடித்ததன் மூலம் பட்டிதொட்டியெங்கும் பேமஸ் ஆனவர்கள் தான் ஆல்யா மானசா - சஞ்சீவ் ஜோடி. இவர்கள் இருவரும் சீரியலில் நடிக்கும்போதே காதலிக்க தொடங்கினர். பின்னர் சீரியல் முடிந்த கையோடு இருவரும் திருமணமும் செய்துகொண்டனர். தற்போது இவர்களுக்கு இரண்டு குழந்தைகள் உள்ளனர். திருமணத்துக்கு பின்னரும் இருவரும் சின்னத்திரை சீரியல்களில் நடித்து வருகின்றனர். சித்து - ஸ்ரேயா சித்து மற்றும் ஸ்ரேயா அஞ்சன் ஜோடியும் சீரியலில் ஜோடியாக நடித்து காதலித்து பின்னர் திருமணம் செய்துகொண்டனர். இவர்கள் இருவரும் திருமணம் என்கிற சீரியலில் ஜோடியாக நடித்திருந்தனர். அந்த சீரியல் முடிந்ததும் இவர்களது...

title: Ratan Tata: ‘భారతీయులకు ఇది బాధాకరమైన రోజు’.. రతన్ టాటాకు సినీ ప్రముఖుల నివాళులు
creator: Basha Shek
content: వ్యాపార దిగ్గజం, టాటా గ్రూప్ గౌరవ ఛైర్మన్‌ రతన్‌ టాటా (86) కన్నుమూశారు. గత కొన్ని రోజులుగా అనారోగ్యంతో ఇబ్బంది పడుతోన్న ఆయన బుధవారం (అక్టోబర్ 09) రాత్రి తుదిశ్వాస విడిచారు. వ్యాపార వ్యవహారాల్లో నూతన ఒరవడిని సృష్టించడంతో పాటు నిస్వార్థంగా ఎన్నో సామాజిక సేవా కార్యక్రమాలు చేపట్టిన రతన్ టాటా ఇక లేరనే విషయాన్ని ఎవరూ జీర్ణించుకోలేకపోతున్నారు. పలువురు పారిశ్రామిక వేత్తలు, రాజకీయ నాయకులు, సినీ ప్రముఖులు రతన్ టాటా అందించిన సేవలను గుర్తు చేసుకుంటున్నారు. వ్యాపార దిగ్గజానికి నివాళులు అర్పిస్తున్నారు. సోషల్ మీడియా వేదికగా రతన్ తో తమ కున్న అనుబంధాన్ని గుర్తు చేసుకుంటూ ఎమోషనల్ అవుతున్నారు. ఈ క్రమంలోనే మెగాస్టార్ చిరంజీవి ట్విట్టర్ వేదికగా రతన్ టాటాకు నివాళులు అర్పించారు. ‘భారతీయులకు ఇది ఎంతో బాధాకరమైన రోజు. సామాజిక సేవలో రతన్‌టాటాను మించినవారు లేరు. మనదేశం ఇప్పటి వరకు చూసిన గొప్ప దార్శనికుల్లో రతన్ జీ ఒకరు. ఆయన నిజమైన పారిశ్రామిక వేత్త, పరోపకారి. అసాధారణ మానవుడు. టాటా బ్రాండ్‌లను గ్లోబల్‌ పవర్‌ హౌస్‌గా నిర్మించడమే కాకుండా.. మనదేశ నిర్మాణంలోనూ అద్భుతంగా కృషి చేశారు. మనం ఒక మంచి మనస్సున్న వ్యక్తిని కోల్పోయాం. భారతీయ పారిశ్రామిక వేత్తలలో ఆయన పెంపొందించిన విలువలు భావి తరాలకు స్ఫూర్తినిస్తాయి.. మార్గాన్ని నిర్దేశిస్తాయి. రతన్‌ టాటా ఆత్మకు శాంతి కలగాలని ప్రార్థిస్తున్నా’ అని ట్వీట్ చేశారు చిరంజీవి. చిరంజీవి ట్వీట్.. దేశం ఎప్పటికీ ఆయనకు రుణ పడి ఉంటుంది.. ‘రతన్‌ టాటాది బంగారంలాంటి మనసు. భారతదేశం ఆయనకు ఎప్పటికీ రుణపడి ఉంటుంది. దూరదృష్టి ఉన్న రతన్ జీ ఎంతోమంది జీవితాలను మార్చేశారు. ఆయన ఆత్మకు శాంతి కలగాలని ప్రార్థిస్తున్నా’ అని ఎన్టీఆర్ ట్వీట్ చేశారు. రతన్ జీ మీరు లెజెండ్.. మీకు మరణం లేదు.....

title: Public service shrinks by 2,162 people in six months - Nicola Willis wants more cuts
creator: Jenée Tibshraeny
content: Public service bosses have been following the Government’s directive to slash spending, including cutting staff numbers. New Public Service Commission figures show the public service workforce shrank by 3.3% in the first six months of 2024 to 63,537 people. In other words, there were 2162 fewer fulltime equivalent roles across 39 departments and agencies by the end of June, compared to six months prior. The reduction through 2024 followed a period of growth. Indeed, the expansion of the public service in the last six months of 2023 was such that by June there were still 421 more people employed than a year earlier.

title: Hikone Castle could merit world heritage listing, UNESCO panel says
content: An advisory panel to UNESCO has told the Japanese government that Hikone Castle in Shiga Prefecture may possibly meet a criterion for inscription on the World Cultural Heritage list, the Cultural Affairs Agency said Wednesday. Notifying the agency of the outcome of its preliminary assessment on Oct. 2, the International Council on Monuments and Sites (ICOMOS) indicated the possibility of the castle from the Edo Period (1603-1868) being assessed as a property bearing a unique testimony to a disappeared cultural tradition or civilization and satisfying an inscription condition. But at the same time, the panel advised that serial nominations be considered because Hikone Castle alone may not be able to completely explain how systematically the Tokugawa shogunate had governed daimyo feudal lords. That advice runs counter to Shiga's desire to have the castle nominated independently.

title: Nhận chức được 4 tháng, trưởng thôn bị vùi lấp khi cứu lợn giúp người dân
content: Tròn 1 tháng sau vụ sạt lở đất kinh hoàng xảy ra tại xã Trung Lèng Hồ (H.Bát Xát, tỉnh Lào Cai ), những dấu vết của thiên tai vẫn in hằn trên từng mảnh đất, vạt đồi của nơi này. Những hậu quả do mưa lũ để lại tại xã Trung Lèng Hồ vẫn còn rõ nét ẢNH: TRUYỀN HÌNH LÀO CAI Thiên tai tại khu vực xã Trung Lèng Hồ đã cướp đi sinh mạng của 1 người, đến nay vẫn còn 1 người mất tích, 10 ngôi nhà bị phá hủy hoàn toàn, 16 hộ gia đình phải di chuyển khẩn cấp, trên 300 ha đất sản xuất nông nghiệp, nuôi thủy sản bị vùi lấp, ảnh hưởng, nhiều tuyến đường giao thông nông thôn bị sạt lở... Đặc biệt, nỗi đau của những người dân mất đi người thân trong trận sạt lở đất ấy vẫn chưa bao giờ nguôi ngoai. Trưởng thôn ở Trung Lèng Hồ tử vong khi cứu lợn bị mắc kẹt Chia sẻ với Thanh Niên , chị Sùng Thị Ké (29 tuổi, trú thôn Trung Hồ, xã Trung Lèng Hồ) cho biết, trận sạt lở đất hôm 9.9 đã cướp đi tính mạng của chồng chị là anh Lý A Giấy, Trưởng thôn Trung Hồ. Mỗi lần nhìn 2 con nhỏ đang xem điện thoại, chị Ké lại rơi nước mắt nghĩ về chồng. Dường như, trong tâm trí của người phụ nữ này vẫn chưa thể chấp nhận được sự thật chồng mình đã ra đi mãi mãi. Sự ra đi đột ngột của anh Giấy khiến chị...

title: LeBron James complains about flying to Milwaukee for pre-season game
content: LeBron James expressed displeasure on Wednesday with a preseason schedule that has his Los Angeles Lakers flying to the Midwest to face the Milwaukee Bucks for an exhibition NBA game this week. After opening the preseason with two games in Palm Desert, California while their home arena undergoes a major renovation, the Lakers play at Milwaukee on Thursday before closing out the exhibition slate with games in Las Vegas, Phoenix and San Francisco. "Can someone please explain to me why we're getting on a (plane emoji) and heading to Milwaukee for 1 pre-season game!?!?" four-time NBA champion James wrote on X before the 1,750-mile journey. Can someone please explain to me why we’re getting on a ?? and heading to Milwaukee for 1 pre-season game!?!? Former NBA player-turned basketball analyst Richard Jefferson replied: "Bro I'm surprised you on that plane" and James wrote back to his former teammate: "I'm surprised at myself!", along with a man facepalming emoji. The Bucks flew to Los Angeles last preseason for a game against the Lakers. Los Angeles are not the only team logging miles during the 2024 preseason and some even left the United States as the past two NBA champions -- Boston Celtics and Denver Nuggets -- played two exhibition games in Abu Dhabi. —Reuters

title: IND vs SL: ਭਾਰਤ ਨੇ ਸ਼੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ 'ਤੇ 82 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਹਰਾਇਆ, ਸੈਮੀਫਾਈਨਲ 'ਚ ਪਹੁੰਚਣ ਦੀਆਂ ਉਮੀਦਾਂ ਬਰਕਰਾਰ
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: IND vs SL: ਭਾਰਤੀ ਟੀਮ ਨੇ ਨਿਰਧਾਰਤ 20 ਓਵਰਾਂ 'ਚ 3 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਗੁਆ ਕੇ 172 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾਈਆਂ, ਜਿਸ ਦੇ ਜਵਾਬ 'ਚ ਸ਼੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ ਦੀ ਟੀਮ ਸਿਰਫ 90 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਹੀ ਬਣਾ ਸਕੀ। Women T20 WC 2024 IND vs SL: ਮਹਿਲਾ ਟੀ-20 ਕ੍ਰਿਕਟ ਵਿਸ਼ਵ ਕੱਪ 'ਚ ਟੀਮ ਇੰਡੀਆ ਨੇ ਨਿਊਜ਼ੀਲੈਂਡ ਖਿ਼ਲਾਫ਼ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਮੈਚ 'ਚ ਮਿਲੀ ਸ਼ਰਮਨਾਕ ਹਾਰ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਜ਼ਬਰਦਸਤ ਵਾਪਸੀ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ। ਸ਼੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ ਖਿਲਾਫ ਦੁਬਈ ਇੰਟਰਨੈਸ਼ਨਲ ਕ੍ਰਿਕਟ ਸਟੇਡੀਅਮ ਦੁਬਈ ਦੇ ਮੈਦਾਨ 'ਤੇ ਖੇਡੇ ਗਏ ਦੂਜੇ ਟੀ-20 ਮੈਚ 'ਚ ਭਾਰਤੀ ਟੀਮ ਨੇ 82 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਵੱਡੀ ਜਿੱਤ ਹਾਸਲ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ। ਅਤੇ ਸੈਮੀਫਾਈਨਲ 'ਚ ਪਹੁੰਚਣ ਦੀਆਂ ਉਮੀਦਾਂ ਬਰਕਰਾਰ ਰੱਖੀਆਂ ਹਨ। ਭਾਰਤ ਨੇ ਟਾਸ ਜਿੱਤ ਕੇ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਕਰਨ ਦਾ ਫੈਸਲਾ ਕੀਤਾ। ਇਸ ਦੌਰਾਨ ਭਾਰਤ ਨੇ ਸ਼ੈਫਾਲੀ ਵਰਮਾ ਦੀਆਂ 43 ਦੌੜਾਂ, ਸਮ੍ਰਿਤੀ ਮੰਧਾਨਾ ਦੀਆਂ 50 ਅਤੇ ਹਰਮਨਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਕੌਰ ਦੀਆਂ 52 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਦੀ ਮਦਦ ਨਾਲ 172 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾਈਆਂ। ਜਵਾਬ 'ਚ ਸ਼੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ ਦੀ ਟੀਮ 19.5 ਓਵਰਾਂ 'ਚ 90 ਦੌੜਾਂ 'ਤੇ ਆਲਆਊਟ ਹੋ ਗਈ ਅਤੇ 82 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਮੈਚ ਹਾਰ ਗਈ। ਭਾਰਤ ਲਈ ਅਰੁੰਧਤੀ ਅਤੇ ਸ਼ੋਭਨਾ ਨੇ 3-3 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਲਈਆਂ। ਸੈਮੀਫਾਈਨਲ ਦੀ ਦੌੜ 'ਚ ਬਣੇ ਰਹਿਣ ਲਈ ਭਾਰਤ ਲਈ ਇਹ ਮੈਚ ਜਿੱਤਣਾ ਬਹੁਤ ਜ਼ਰੂਰੀ ਸੀ। ਮਹਿਲਾ ਵਿਸ਼ਵ ਕੱਪ 'ਚ ਦੌੜਾਂ ਦੇ ਮਾਮਲੇ 'ਚ ਵੀ ਇਹ ਭਾਰਤ ਦੀ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਡੀ ਜਿੱਤ ਸੀ। ਟੀਮ ਇੰਡੀਆ : 172-3 (20 ਓਵਰ) ਭਾਰਤੀ ਸਲਾਮੀ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ ਸ਼ੈਫਾਲੀ ਵਰਮਾ ਅਤੇ ਸਮ੍ਰਿਤੀ ਮੰਧਾਨਾ ਨੇ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਵਿਕਟ ਲਈ 98 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਜੋੜੀਆਂ। ਸਮ੍ਰਿਤੀ ਨੇ 38 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ 'ਚ 4 ਚੌਕਿਆਂ ਅਤੇ ਇਕ ਛੱਕੇ ਦੀ ਮਦਦ ਨਾਲ 50 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾਈਆਂ। ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਕੰਚਨਾ ਅਤੇ ਚਮਾਰੀ ਨੇ ਰਨ ਆਊਟ ਕੀਤਾ। ਇਸੇ ਓਵਰ ਦੀ ਅਗਲੀ ਗੇਂਦ 'ਤੇ ਸ਼ੈਫਾਲੀ ਵੀ ਆਊਟ ਹੋ ਗਈ। ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਕਪਤਾਨ ਹਰਮਨਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਕੌਨ ਨੇ ਇਕ ਸਿਰੇ ਦੀ ਜ਼ਿੰਮੇਵਾਰੀ ਸੰਭਾਲੀ ਅਤੇ ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾਈਆਂ। ਇਸ ਦੌਰਾਨ ਜੇਮਿਮ੍ਹਾ 10 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ 'ਚ 2 ਚੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਮਦਦ ਨਾਲ 16 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾ ਕੇ ਆਊਟ ਹੋ ਗਈ। ਹਰਮਨਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਨੇ 27 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ ਵਿਚ 8 ਚੌਕਿਆਂ ਅਤੇ ਇਕ ਛੱਕੇ ਦੀ ਮਦਦ ਨਾਲ 52 ਦੌੜਾਂ ਬਣਾਈਆਂ। ਸ੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ : 90-10 (19.5 ਓਵਰ) ਸ਼੍ਰੀਲੰਕਾ...

title: Ratan Tata: When veteran industrialist humiliated by Bill Ford, later acquired his Jaguar Land Rover
content: Ratan Tata (Ratan Naval Tata), the former Tata Group chairman and iconic industrialist died at south Mumbai’s Breach Candy Hospital at 11.30 pm on Wednesday. He was 86. The Padma Vibhushan recipient has been in intensive care at the hospital since Monday. He will be remembered for his contribution to the industry. He revolutionalised several sector ranging from automobile to software to FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods). The veteran industrialist also known for transforming a staid group into India's largest and most influential conglomerate with a string of eye-catching deals. Educated at Cornell University, Ithaca, New York, the veteran industrialist worked on the shop floor at the family-run group after returning to India in 1962. He became chairman of Tata Industries in 1991 and took over as the chairman of the Tata Group from his uncle, JRD, who had been in charge for more than half a century. Under his leadership, the Tata Group embarked on a massive expansion drive, snapping iconic British assets including steelmaker Corus and luxury carmaker Jaguar Land Rover. There is an interesting story about acquiring luxury carmaker Jaguar Land Rover. As India's economy started booming in the 2000s, Ratan Tata adopted calculated risk-taking strategies to capitalise on India's economic growth. In 2008, he decided to acquire Jaguar and Land Rover, now JLR, from Ford for USD 2.3 billion. The move surprised his rivals in India and globally as well. There is a dramatic story about...

title: Antonio Pierce's Head-Scratching Davante Adams Trade Comments Left NFL Fans Baffled
content: Davante Adams wants the Las Vegas Raiders to trade him. Head coach Antonio Pierce has other plans, or so he says. As a potential trade looms and the two top suitors, the New York Jets and New Orleans Saints, deal with tough situations, Adams' immediate future remains a question mark. In roughly 24 hours, Jets owner Woody Johnson fired head coach Robert Saleh with the team just one game back of the division lead. Meanwhile, in the Bayou, Saints quarterback and Adams' close friend Derek Carr will miss multiple weeks due to an oblique injury. While it's entirely plausible that either team still makes a full-blown push to acquire Adams, the situation has become somewhat complicated. Pierce addressed the situation Wednesday, and his comments left fans in a whirlwind while adding even more confusion. Stephen R. Sylvanie-Imagn Images Pierce adamantly stated that Adams is "still a Raider" and that will play when healthy. As Pierce told reporters, Adams is "working every day" and is "in the right headspace mentally." "He's still a Raider. He's never not been a Raider," Pierce said. "When he's healthy and he can play, we'll play him. He's just not healthy right now, and he's getting closer, though; that's the good part." "He's working every day to get that hamstring right [and] he's in the right headspace mentally. We talked recently and had a good conversation and he's ready to play football." Pierce also responded to a question about Adams' rehab, revealing that the wide receiver...

title: हरियाणा नतीजों को लेकर EVM पर भड़के सत्यपाल मलिक, कांग्रेस को भी दे डाली नसीहत
creator: एबीपी लाइव
content: हरियाणा विधानसभा चुनाव में मिली हार के बाद कांग्रेस ने ईवीएम पर सवाल खड़े करते हुए चुनाव आयोग में शिकायत की है. इन सबके बीच राज्यपाल सत्यपाल मलिक ने भी नतीजों पर सवाल उठाए हैं. उन्होंने कहा कि EVM से चुनाव नहीं होने चाहिए. ईवीएम से निष्पक्ष चुनाव नहीं हो सकते. दुनिया में कहीं भी EVM से चुनाव नहीं होते. साथ ही सत्यपाल मलिक ने कांग्रेस को बीजेपी से सीखने की नसीहत भी दे डाली. हरियाणा और जम्मू-कश्मीर में विधानसभा चुनाव के नतीजों के बाद पूर्व राज्यपाल सत्यपाल मलिक ने बीजेपी को 24 घंटे राजनीति करने वाली पार्टी बताया. उन्होंने कांग्रेस को और संघर्ष करने के लिए सलाह दी. सत्यपाल ने मीडिया से बातचीत के दौरान जम्मू-कश्मीर के नतीजों को उम्मीद के मुताबिक बताया, वहीं दूसरी ओर हरियाणा के नतीजों पर उन्होंने हैरानी व्यक्त की. साथ ही उन्होंने ये भी कहा कि कांग्रेस अपनी खामियों की वजह से हार का शिकार हुई है. वहीं हार की सबसे बड़ी वजह भूपेंद्र हुड्डा और कुमारी शैलजा के बीच चली खींचतान को बताया है. बीजेपी के लिए कही ये बड़ी बात तमाम एग्जिट पोल हरियाणा में कांग्रेस की सरकार बनाने की संभावना जता रहे थे. लेकिन नतीजे इसके उलट आए. बीजेपी ने हैट्रिक लगाकर सभी को चौंका दिया. इस पर जम्मू कश्मीर के पूर्व राज्यपाल मलिक ने कहा कि हरियाणा में कांग्रेस के हार की वजह पार्टी का आलस बताया. उन्होंने कहा कि कांग्रेस मेहनत नहीं करती. उन्होंने राज्य में कांग्रेस की हार के पीछे नेताओं के आपसी संबंध ठीक न होने को भी एक कारण बताया. भूपेंद्र हुड्डा और कुमारी शैलजा के बीच खींचतान का जिक्र करते हुए सत्यपाल मलिक ने कहा, पार्टी के सभी नेता एकजुट होकर चुनाव लड़ते तो हरियाणा चुनाव में कांग्रेस के जीत की संभावना होती. मलिक ने...

title: Силы ПВО сбили десять дронов над Ростовской областью
content: МОСКВА, 10 окт - РИА Новости. Десять БПЛА уничтожены и подавлены средствами РЭБ ночью в Ростовской области, предварительно, пострадавших и разрушений на земле нет, сообщил губернатор Василий Голубев. "Всего за ночь в Ростовской области уничтожено и подавлено средствами радиоэлектронной борьбы 10 БПЛА. По предварительным данным, пострадавших и разрушений на земле нет", - написал он в Telegram-канале.

title: NBA》「控球之神」保羅首度合體天才斑馬! 精彩空接灌籃嗨翻全場
content: 保羅與溫班亞瑪首度聯手默契不俗。(取自推特) 〔體育中心/綜合報導〕39歲「控球之神」保羅(Chris Paul)本季轉戰馬刺,今與天才狀元「斑馬」溫班亞瑪(Victor Wembanyama)在季前熱身賽首度合體,兩人有漂亮搭配,終場馬刺以107:97擊敗魔術。 保羅與溫班亞瑪今日一同先發上陣,兩人首度聯手默契不俗,第一節就上演精彩連線,一次擋拆配合後,保羅妙傳給溫班亞瑪完成空中接力灌籃,讓現場嗨翻。 請繼續往下閱讀... 保羅此戰4投2中攻下5分,另有2籃板、3助攻、2抄截,溫班亞瑪則是15投4中手感有待加強,得到11分、9籃板、4助攻、3阻攻。 賽後談到與保羅的搭配,溫班亞瑪直呼感覺很自然,保羅則稱讚溫班亞瑪很聰明,互相給彼此好評。此外,馬刺總教練帕波維奇(Gregg Popovich)也對保羅讚不絕口,表示很喜歡他對球隊的指導。 CHRIS PAUL & VICTOR WEMBANYAMA LOB. pic.twitter.com/JUuVzrLnpc 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Stock Market October 10 Update: घरेलू बाजार आज हरे या लाल निशान पर खुलेगा? जानें क्या मिल रहे हैं संकेत
content: Global Market Today : भारतीय शेयर बाजार (Indian Stock Market) के बेंचमार्क सूचकांक सेंसेक्स और निफ्टी 50 के आज 10 अक्टूबर को भी बढ़त के साथ खुलने की संभावना है. गिफ्ट निफ्टी (Gift Nifty Today) के रुझान भी भारतीय बेंचमार्क इंडेक्स के लिए सपाट से सकारात्मक शुरुआत का संकेत दे रहे हैं. प्री-ओपनिंग सेशन में बेंचमार्क इंडेक्स ऊंचे स्तर पर कारोबार कर रहे हैं. सेंसेक्स 443.87 अंक या 0.54 प्रतिशत ऊपर 81,910.97 पर और निफ्टी 138.50 अंक या 0.55 प्रतिशत ऊपर 25,120.50 पर था. यह भी पढ़ें- IPO Update: Shiv Texchem को पहले दिन 4 गुना और Garuda Construction को दोगुना सब्सक्रिप्शन वॉल स्ट्रीट (Wall Street) पर बढ़त के बाद एशिया-प्रशांत क्षेत्र के लगभग सभी बाजार हरे निशान पर है. हांगकांग का हैंग सेंग सूचकांक (Hang Seng Index) 2.1 प्रतिशत ऊपर चढ़ा, जबकि मेनलैंड चीन का शंघाई कंपोजिट (Shanghai Composite) 0.81 प्रतिशत नीचे था और सीएसआई 300 (CSI) में 2.03 प्रतिशत की गिरावट आई. जापान का निक्केई 225 (Japan Nikkei 225) 0.2 फीसदी ऊपर कारोबार कर रहा था, जबकि दक्षिण कोरिया का कोस्पी (Kospi) 0.5 फीसदी आगे था. ऑस्ट्रेलिया का S&P/ASX 200 भी 0.6 फीसदी ऊपर भागा. डिस्क्लेमर: यह लेख केवल जानकारी के उद्देश्यों के लिए है और इसे वित्तीय सलाह के रूप में नहीं लिया जाना चाहिए. पाठकों को सलाह दी जाती है कि वे अपने वित्तीय निर्णय लेने से पहले स्वतंत्र पेशेवर सलाह लें. लेखक और प्रकाशक इस जानकारी के आधार पर किए गए किसी भी निर्णय या कार्य के लिए जिम्मेदार नहीं होंगे. सभी निवेश जोखिमों के अधीन होते हैं और पाठकों को सावधानी से विचार करने की सलाह दी जाती है.

title: സ്ത്രീത്വത്തെ അപമാനിച്ചു; പ്രമുഖ നിർമാതാക്കൾക്കെതിരെ വനിതാ നിർമാതാവിന്‍റെ പരാതി
content: കൊച്ചി: സ്ത്രീത്വത്തെ അപമാനിച്ചു എന്നാരോപിച്ച് കേരള ഫിലിം പ്രോഡ്യൂസേഴ്‌സ് അസോസിയേഷന്‍ ഭാരവാഹികള്‍ക്കെതിരെ പരാതിയുമായി വനിതാ ചലച്ചിത്ര നിര്‍മാതാവ്. എറണാകുളം സെന്‍ട്രല്‍ പോലീസാണ് കേസെടുത്തത്. ഹേമാ കമ്മറ്റി റിപ്പോര്‍ട്ട് വന്നതിന് പിന്നാലെ രൂപീകരിച്ച പ്രത്യേക അന്വേഷണ സംഘമാണ് കേസ് അന്വേഷിക്കുക. സിനിമാ മേഖലയില്‍ നിന്നുണ്ടായ തൊഴില്‍ ചൂഷണം, ദുരനുഭവങ്ങള്‍ എന്നിവയുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ട് പ്രൊഡ്യൂസേഴ്‌സ് അസോസിയേഷന് വനിതാ നിര്‍മാതാവ് പരാതി നല്‍കിയിരുന്നു. എന്നാല്‍ അസോസിയേഷന്‍ പരാതി പരിഗണിക്കുന്നതിന് പകരം വിളിച്ചുവരുത്തി അപമാനിച്ചുവെന്നും മാനസികമായി പീഡിപ്പിച്ചുവെന്നും പരാതിയില്‍ ആരോപിക്കുന്നു. ആന്റോ ജോസഫ്, അനില്‍ തോമസ്, ബി രാഗേഷ്, ലിസ്റ്റിന്‍ സ്റ്റീഫന്‍ എന്നിവര്‍ ഉള്‍പ്പടെയുള്ള അസോസിയേഷന്‍ ഭാരവാഹികള്‍ക്കെതിരെയാണ് കേസ് നല്‍കിയത്. ഒമ്പത് പേര്‍ക്കെതിരെയാണ് കേസെടുത്തിരിക്കുന്നത്.

title: 눈속임 제대로! 필러 맞은 3D 입술 만드는 법
creator: 황혜원
content: 통통하고 매끈한, 말 그대로 체리 같은 입술! 필러를 맞은 것도 아닌데 이런 입술이 가능하다고요? 착시 효과 제대로 내는 법을 알려드립니다. 도톰하고 입체감 있는 입술은 여성들의 로망입니다. 아마 입술이 전체적인 인상에 미치는 영향이 무척 크기 때문일 거예요. 입술이 얇으면 나이 들거나 옹졸해 보이고, 입술이 전체적으로 두꺼우면 퉁명스러워 보이거든요. 보톡스나 필러 등 시술이 답이 될 수 있겠지만 부담스럽고 혹시 모를 부작용도 걱정스럽습니다. 그렇지만 다행히 우리에겐 메이크업이라는 눈속임이 있죠? 필러를 맞은 듯 통통하고 입체감 있는 입술 만드는 법을 알려드립니다. 뷰티 인플루언서 자넬의 팁을 참고해볼게요. Step 1 먼저 컨실러로 입술 본연의 색과 라인을 없애줍니다. Step 2 입술의 아우트라인을 잡아줍니다. 자넬은 립스틱을 사용했지만 립 라이너를 사용하면 훨씬 편할 거예요. 립 제품으로 윗입술 산 사이를 채워주세요. 그런 다음 아랫입술 라인의 중앙 부분을 중심으로 라인을 그려줍니다. Step 3 입술의 입체감을 살리는 작업입니다. 아랫입술 정가운데에 세로 라인을 그리고, 윗입술 안쪽에 색을 칠해주면 음영이 생기면서 입술이 입체적으로 보일 겁니다. Step 4 입꼬리를 올려주세요. 양옆 입꼬리를 살짝 올리듯 라인을 그리면 됩니다. 그 후 손가락으로 색을 조심스레 퍼뜨려주면 완성입니다. 어떤가요? 입체감이 확실히 살아났죠?

title: Israel must face the real threat posed by Iran and avoid retaliation for its own sake
creator: Omer Bar-Lev
content: On the eve of what is set to be an Israeli attack on Iran in response to Tehran's fire at Israel before Rosh Hashanah, it is worth examining the direct conflict between the two countries closely and thinking deeply about its results, and, after that, about what comes next.

title: ଟାଟା ସଲ୍ଟ ଠାରୁ ଏୟାରଲାଇନ୍‌ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ, ବିଶାଳ ସାମ୍ରାଜ୍ୟ ଛାଡିଗଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା
content: Ratan TATA: ରତନ ଟାଟାଙ୍କ ପରଲୋକ । ଆଉ ନାହାନ୍ତି ବିଶିଷ୍ଟ ଶିଳ୍ପପତି ରତନ ଟାଟା । ୮୬ ବର୍ଷ ବୟସରେ ଚିକିତ୍ସାଧିନ ଅବସ୍ଥାରେ ତାଙ୍କର ଦେହାନ୍ତ ହୋଇଛି । ମୁମ୍ବାଇର ଏକ ଘରୋଇ ହସପିଟାଲରେ କିଛି ଦିନ ଧରି ସେ ଚିକିତ୍ସିତ ହେଉଥିଲେ । ବିଜନେସ୍ ଟାଇକୁନଙ୍କ ପରଲୋକରେ ଦେଶବ୍ୟାପୀ ଶୋକର ଛାୟା ଖେଳିଯାଇଛି । ଉଦ୍ୟୋଗପତି ସହ ସମାଜସେବୀ ଭାବେ ପରିଚିତ ଥିଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । ଭାରତର ଶିଳ୍ପ କ୍ଷେତ୍ରକୁ ଆଗେଇ ନେବାରେ ସେ ଏକ ବଡ ଭୂମିକା ନେଇଥିଲେ । ୧୯୯୧ରୁ ୨୦୧୨ ଯାଏଁ ଟାଟା ଗ୍ରୁପ ଅଧ୍ୟକ୍ଷ ଥିଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । ନାନୋ ଭଳି ଶସ୍ତା କାର୍ ଥିଲା ରତନ ଟାଟାଙ୍କ ବଡ଼ ଭେଟି । ୧୯୩୭ରେ ତତ୍କାଳୀନ ବମ୍ବେରେ ଜନ୍ମ ହୋଇଥିଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । ଭାରତର ବ୍ୟବସାୟିକ ଶିଳ୍ପର ବିଶ୍ବକର୍ମା ତଥା ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ଦୁନିଆକୁ ନୂଆ ଦିଶା ଦେଇଥିବା ମହାନ୍ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି ଆଉ ନାହାନ୍ତି । ଚାଲିଗଲେ ଭାରତର ଅସଲି ରତ୍ନ ପଦ୍ମ ବିଭୂଷଣ 'ରତନ ଟାଟା' । ୮୬ ବର୍ଷ ବୟସରେ ଦୁନିଆକୁ ଅଲବିଦା କହିଛନ୍ତି ବିଶିଷ୍ଟ ଶିଳ୍ପପତି ତଥା ଜଣେ ସମାଜସେବୀ ତଥା ଲିଜେଣ୍ଡ ରତନ ଟାଟା । ମୁମ୍ବାଇର ବ୍ରିଚ୍ କ୍ୟାଣ୍ଡି ହସ୍ପିଟାଲରେ ଶେଷ ନିଃଶ୍ବାସ ତ୍ୟାଗ କରିଛନ୍ତି ରତନ ନାଭାଲ ଟାଟା । ବୟସାଧିକ କାରଣରୁ ହସ୍ପିଟାଲରେ ଭର୍ତ୍ତି ହୋଇଥିଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । କିନ୍ତୁ ଡାକ୍ତରଙ୍କ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରଚେଷ୍ଟା ସତ୍ତ୍ବେ ଚାଲିଗଲେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । କୋଟି କୋଟି ଭାରତୀୟଙ୍କ ହୃଦୟରେ ଜଣେ ଉଦାରବାଦୀ ମଣିଷ, ଜଣେ ବିଜନେସ୍‌ ଟାଇକୁନ, ଜଣେ ପ୍ରକୃତ ସମାଜସେବୀ ଭାବେ ଛାପ ଛାଡିଗଲେ । ରତନ ଟାଟାଙ୍କ ବିୟୋଗରେ ରାଷ୍ଟ୍ରପତି ଦ୍ରୌପଦୀ ମୁର୍ମୁ, ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ନରେନ୍ଦ୍ର ମୋଦିଙ୍କ ସମେତ ବହୁ ବିଶିଷ୍ଟ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି ଶୋକ ପ୍ରକାଶ କରିଛନ୍ତି । ଆରପାରିରେ ରତନ ଟାଟା । କିନ୍ତୁ ପଛରେ ଛାଡିଗଲେ ବିଶାଳ ବ୍ୟବସାୟିକ ସାମ୍ରାଜ୍ୟ । ଦୈନନ୍ଦିନ ବ୍ୟବହାର ଜିନିଷ ଠାରୁ ଆରମ୍ଭ କରି ବିମାନ ଯାତ୍ରା ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ, ସବୁଠି ରହିଛି ଟାଟା ଗ୍ରୁପ୍‌ର ବ୍ୟବସାୟିକ ପତିଆରା । ରତନ ଟାଟାଙ୍କ ଉଦ୍ୟମରେ ଟାଟା ଗ୍ରୁପ୍‌ ଆଜି ବିଶାଳ ଦ୍ରୁମରେ ପରିଣତ ହୋଇଛି । କିନ୍ତୁ ଏବେ ସେ ସବୁକୁ ଦେଖିବାକୁ ଆଉ ନାହାନ୍ତି ରତନ ଟାଟା । ରତନ ଟାଟାଙ୍କ...

title: Ratan Tata : रतन टाटा यांच्या कुंडलीत पारस योग; हात लावताच मातीचे सोने; पण या योगाने सुखी संसाराचे स्वप्न हिरावले
creator: KALYAN DESHMUKH
content: देशाचे महान उद्योगपती रतन टाटा आता आपल्यात नाहीत. बुधवारी संध्याकाळी त्यांनी मुंबईतील ब्रीच कँडी रुगालयात अखेरचा श्वास घेतला. रतन टाटा यांना प्रेमाच मोठं यश मिळाले नसले तरी व्यावसायिक आणि व्यावहारिक जगतात त्यांनी मोठी भरारी घेतली. ज्योतिषशास्त्राच्या दाव्यानुसार, त्यांच्या जन्मकुंडलीतच याविषयीचे योग होते. अनेक ज्योतिषांनी त्यांच्या जन्मकुंडलीचा अभ्यास केला आहे. विपरीत परिस्थितीत सुद्धा त्यांनी आव्हानं पेलली आणि यशश्री खेचून आणला. त्यांच्या मेहनतीला भाग्याची साथ मिळाल्याचा दावा ज्योतिष करतात. त्यांनी मातीला जरी हात लावला तरी त्याचं सोनं करण्याची ताकद त्यांच्यात होती. सृष्टीतील सर्व ग्रह आणि नक्षत्र त्यांच्या या कार्यात त्यांना बळ देत असल्याचे जन्मकुंडली अभ्यासकांचा दावा आहे. त्यांच्या जन्मकुंडलीवर नजर टाकल्यास त्यांना कोणत्या ग्रहाचे बळ मिळाले, कोणता योगाने मदत केली हे समोर आले. रतन टाटा यांचा जन्म 28 डिसेंबर 1937 रोजी सकाळी 6.30 वाजता झाला होता. त्यांची जन्मकुंडली धनु लग्न आणि तुळा राशीची आहे. त्यांच्या लग्नात सूर्य, बुध आणि शुक्र जोमात होता. त्यांचा गुरू हा लक्ष्मी योगात, धन गृहात आहे. मंगळ तिसऱ्या घरात आहे. तर शनिची स्थिती चौथ्या घरात आहे. अकराव्या राशीतील चंद्र आणि बाराव्या-सहाव्या भावात राहू-केतूचे घट्ट समीकरण दिसून येते. या स्थितीत रतन टाटा यांच्या कुंडलीत दुर्मिळ असा बुधादित्य योग तयार झाल्याचे दिसून येते. या योगामुळे जातकाला, व्यक्तीला दूरदृष्टी आणि चांगल्या परिणामासाठी योग्य निर्णय घेण्याचे बळ मिळते. म्हणजेच कोणते कार्य केल्यास त्यापासून फायदा होईल की तोटा याचा अंदाज घेण्याची उपजत हतोटी त्या व्यक्तीला, जातकाला प्राप्त होते. ज्योतिष शास्त्रानुसार, लग्न कुंडलीत अशा...

title: Former Site Of WWE ThunderDome Has Roof Destroyed By Hurricane Milton
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: The former site of the WWE ThunderDome saw its roof destroyed by the arrival of Hurricane Milton. The Category Three storm made landfall in Florida on Wednesday night and video on social media showed Tropicana Field with the roof torn off, as you can see below. The venue hosted the WWE ThunderDome during the lockdown era of the pandemic from late 2020 until April of 2021. On behalf of 411, our best wishes to everyone in Florida and hope that you all stay safe. The view from our window as we ride out the storm. The roof of Tropicana Field is destroyed by the winds of #HurricaneMilton . Praying for Tampa Bay and all areas affected. Stay safe, everyone pic.twitter.com/uy0aNGMAuJ — Dave Moore (@DaveMoore_83) October 10, 2024 OMG. We all had a collected gasp when we saw this from our reporter. The fabric on the roof of Tropicana Field is shredded. #StPete #Milton pic.twitter.com/36UKLO9cK6 — Jason Adams (@JasonAdamsWFTS) October 10, 2024

title: Milton Kasırgası Florida kıyılarında etkisini göstermeye başladı! Olağanüstü hal ilan edildi
content: Ulusal Kasırga Merkezi (NHC), Milton Kasırgası 'nın çarşamba akşamı Kategori 3 şiddetinde bir fırtına olarak Florida 'nın Siesta Key yakınlarında karaya çıktığını duyurdu. Akşam saat 8.30 sularında bölgeye ulaşan kasırganın, Florida'nın batı-orta kıyılarını vurarak büyük bir yıkıma neden olabilecek kapasitede olduğu belirtildi. Kasırganın karaya ulaştığı an itibarıyla maksimum sürekli rüzgar hızı saatte 190 km olarak kaydedildi ve kasırganın doğu-kuzeydoğu yönünde saatte 24 km hızla ilerlediği bildirildi. Milton Kasırgası'nın etki alanı ve rüzgar gücü Kasırganın merkezinden 56 km uzaklığa kadar kasırga kuvvetindeki rüzgarlar etkili olurken, tropikal fırtına kuvvetindeki rüzgarlar özellikle kuzey yönünde 400 km uzaklığa kadar yayıldı. Meteorologlar, bu güçlü rüzgarların Tampa Körfezi bölgesi de dahil olmak üzere eyaletin geniş bir alanını etkilemesini bekliyor. Rüzgarlar çarşamba akşamından perşembe sabahına kadar devam ederek bölgedeki yaşamı olumsuz etkileyecek. Milton kategori 3 kuvvetinde karaya çıktıktan iki saatten kısa bir süre sonra Kategori 2 fırtınaya indirildi. Florida kıyılarında 1,3 milyondan fazla ev ve iş yerinin elektriğini kesti. Olağanüstü hal ve başkanlık afet ilanı Florida Valisi Ron DeSantis, kasırganın tehdit oluşturduğu 51 ilçe için olağanüstü hal ilan ederken, Başkan Joe Biden, Milton Kasırgası'nın neden olabileceği zararlara karşı önceden tedbir almak amacıyla federal bir afet ilanını...

title: Hurricane Milton makes Florida landfall as a Category 3 storm; multiple tornado deaths reported
content: ORLANDO, Fla. — Hurricane Milton made landfall on Siesta Key on the Florida Gulf Coast on Wednesday night as a major Category 3 hurricane with 120 mph winds as the state has endured an assault of at least 19 tornadoes that resulted in multiple deaths. St. Lucie County Sheriff Keith Pearson said the county had more than a dozen confirmed tornado touchdowns, and one destroyed a senior community neighborhood made up of mostly mobile homes. “They didn’t stand a chance,” he said, but did not give details about how many had died. The National Hurricane Center said the eye of the hurricane passed over the barrier island just west of Sarasota at 8:30 p.m. “The northern eyewall of Hurricane Milton is beginning to move onshore of the Florida gulf coast near Tampa and St. Petersburg where an Extreme Wind Warning is now in effect,” the National Hurricane Center warned at 7 p.m. “Please shelter in place as these extremely dangerous hurricane-force winds overspread the region.” As of the special 8:30 p.m. advisory, the center of Milton was located about 5 miles west of Sarasota and 115 miles southwest of Orlando moving east-northeast at 15 mph with maximum sustained winds of 120 mph, making it a major Category 3 hurricane having dropped from Category 5 hurricane it had been overnight. By 11 p.m., the storm was located 75 miles southwest of Orlando and 100 miles west-southwest of Cape Canaveral moving east-northeast at 16 mph with maximum sustained winds of 105 mph, which is still a...

title: Giancarlo Stanton's homer gives Yankees 2-1 edge on Royals
creator: Field Level Media
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- Giancarlo Stanton hit a long go-ahead home run in the eighth inning Wednesday night, leading the New York Yankees to a 3-2 victory against the Kansas City Royals in Game 3 of the American League Division Series. "I just wanted to hit the ball hard," said Stanton. "You go up and try to hit a homer but you have to put yourself on time. If you get your bat through the zone on time, you give yourself a good shot." The Yankees lead the best-of-five set two games to one, and they can advance to the AL Championship Series with a victory in Game 4 on Thursday in Kansas City. Stanton finished 3-for-5, driving in another run with a double and adding a stolen base. His 12th career postseason homer, a 417-foot shot to left field against left-hander Kris Bubic, came off his bat at 112.9 mph, according to MLB Statcast data. Bubic (0-1) had not allowed a run in three previous appearances during this year's postseason. "It was more about the count than the location," Bubic said. "That's where my good slider usually ends up. He had already seen a slider earlier in the count. Sometimes they put a good swing on a good pitch and you have to tip your cap." New York's bullpen, with Luke Weaver getting the final five outs for his second postseason save, kept the Royals scoreless after the fifth inning. Tommy Kahnle (1-0) got the victory with 1 1/3 perfect innings in relief after following starter Clarke Schmidt and Clay Holmes to the mound. Kansas City's best late scoring...

title: 密爾頓登陸佛州後減弱至2級颶風!多地慘遭洪災 增至200萬戶停電
content: 颶風 密爾頓當地時間9日晚間8時半左右以3級颶風強度,從美國佛州西部的西耶斯達島(Siesta Key)附近登陸,風速達每小時120英里(每小時193公里),並帶來驚人 雨量 ,導致約190萬戶家庭 停電 ,部分地區陷入淹水,直至當日晚間10時左右,密爾頓已減弱成2級颶風。 佛州目前已有超過200萬戶停電,總統拜登與佛州多名國會議員及市長通話,要求全力應對災情,有需要時可要求聯邦政府提供額外援助。 聯邦緊急管理局要求佛州居民盡量待在室內,現時各避難中心有超過7萬人入住。氣象部門預計,密爾頓將在9日夜間橫越佛州,影響將持續到10日早上。 佛州西部城市聖彼得堡2小時的降雨量超過200毫米,陣風時速達破紀錄的135公里。墨西哥灣沿岸多處地區在風暴潮下,受洪水圍困,居民指出,半小時內水位上升數公尺,路面普遍水深過膝。 颶風還影響航空交通,截至9日下午全美有1900班航班取消,至少6個佛州機場已關閉。位於佛州奧蘭多的三個主題樂園,包括迪士尼世界度假區、環球影城及海洋世界已暫停對外開放,預計10日將持續關閉。 颶風密爾頓當地時間9日晚間8時半左右登陸美國佛州西部,帶來狂風暴雨。路透 截至9日當日晚間10時左右,密爾頓已減弱成2級颶風。美聯社 ▪ 最新民調/「壕溝戰」開打!7搖擺州選情膠著 賀錦麗微幅領先 ▪ 賀川優劣勢在哪?白宮爭奪戰倒數1個月 專家解局一針見血 ▪ 兩岸情勢怎麼看?賀川政策立場前後矛盾 美選8大主戰場牽動民調

title: La policía alemana desmantela un campamento propalestino ante la visita de Greta Thunberg
content: Paro de transportistas Dólar en Perú Dina Boluarte Accidente en Arequipa Andrés Hurtado Shakira EsSalud DNI Selección peruana Corte de agua P. Diddy Huracán Milton Miguel Grau Horóscopo ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Thunberg criticó a las autoridades alemanas por amenazar a los activistas propalestinos y acusó de violencia por su presencia en la manifestación del 7 de octubre. La policía alemana cerró un campamento de protesta propalestino que había invitado a Greta Thunberg, una voz muy crítica con Israel, que acusó a las autoridades de silenciar activistas. La policía argumentó que la activista climática sueca de 21 años asistió a una manifestación propalestina en Berlín el lunes, aniversario del ataque de Hamás contra Israel el 7 de octubre de 2023, que terminó en enfrentamientos con la policía. "Los recientes acontecimientos relacionados con la persona de Thunberg han llevado a considerar que ella era una participante dispuesta a recurrir a la violencia", justificó la policía de la ciudad de Dortmund, oeste de Alemania. "Fui invitada por el Campamento de Estudiantes Palestinos en Dortmund a participar en una mesa redonda. Poco después de que publicaran una foto anunciando este evento, la policía vino a decirles que tenían que irse y que me arrestarían si iba allí", denunció Thunberg en un mensaje de vídeo en la red social X. La joven,...

title: 柯志恩曝「小時候國慶日提燈籠遊行」掀起回憶殺
content: 高雄果貿是傳統 眷村 社區,街道旗海飄揚, 國慶 日節慶氣氛濃厚。國民黨高雄市黨部主委 柯志恩 今早前往果貿參加升旗活動,憶及童年在國慶日晚上提燈籠遊行,她還自我調侃,若有共同回憶的人,應該年紀也不小了。柯志恩說,期許有一天,不是只有果貿在大街小巷掛 國旗 ,高雄各地都是這樣。 今早左營果貿社區舉辦國慶日升旗典禮,立委柯志恩會同黃復興高雄市黨部主委張平海,以及陳玫娟、黃香菽與白喬茵等議員與居民一起唱國歌,祝賀中華民國生日快樂。 柯智恩表示,今早騎單車到果貿參加升旗活動,感覺好像回到小時候,也是騎單車去學校參加升旗典禮,以前晚上還會提燈籠遊行,若有共同回憶的人,相信年紀也不小了;果貿是聖土,不只是網美拍照而已,更是中華民國精神非常大的延伸,今天看見好多老伯伯身體雖沒當年勇,但堅毅眼神及一貫感覺永遠不變,人可以凋零,後代子孫因為我們的堅持,會把中華民國精神永遠傳續下去,這就是萬萬歲 。 柯志恩說,期許有一天,高雄不是只有果貿,在任何地方,國旗可以掛在大街小巷。 早年台灣雙十國慶、光復紀念日等節日都會辦遊行活動,參加者拿旗幟或紅布條,沿街敲鑼打鼓高呼愛國口號,不像現在只有晚會或焰火。柯志恩提及童年時期的國慶日回憶,也有網友回應說「小時候國慶日提燈籠遊行,真的是滿滿的回憶」、「小時候在眷村內外,家家都會懸掛國旗」、「感動!回到讀書歲月」等共鳴。 高雄果貿社區舉辦國慶日升旗活動,場面盛大且歡樂。圖/讀者提供

title: Ratan Tata Funeral: രത്തൻ ടാറ്റയുടെ സംസ്കാരം ഇന്ന്; ഔദ്യോ​ഗിക ബഹുമതികളോടെ വിട നൽകും
creator: zee news malayalam
content: മുംബൈ: അന്തരിച്ച പ്രമുഖ വ്യവസായി രത്തൻ ടാറ്റയുടെ സംസ്കാരം ഇന്ന് ഔദ്യോ​ഗിക ബഹുമതികളോടെ. മഹാരാഷ്ട്ര മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി ഏക്നാഥ് ഷിൻഡെയാണ് ഇക്കാര്യം അറിയിച്ചത്. ദക്ഷിണ മുംബൈയിലെ നരിമാൻ പോയിൻ്റിലുള്ള നാഷണൽ സെൻ്റർ ഫോർ പെർഫോമിംഗ് ആർട്‌സിൽ രത്തൻ ടാറ്റയുടെ ഭൗതികദേഹം പൊതുദർശനത്തിന് വെയ്ക്കും. രാവിലെ 10 മുതലാണ് പൊതുദർശനം. ഉച്ചതിരിഞ്ഞ് 3.30ന് മൃതദേഹം സംസ്‌കാരത്തിനായി വോർളി ശ്മശാനത്തിലേക്ക് കൊണ്ടുപോകും. രത്തൻ ടാറ്റയുടെ നിര്യാണത്തെ തുടർന്ന് മഹാരാഷ്ട്ര സർക്കാർ ഇന്ന് സംസ്ഥാന വ്യാപകമായി ദുഃഖാചരണം പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ട്. സംസ്ഥാനത്തെ സർക്കാർ ഓഫീസുകളിൽ ദേശീയ പതാക പകുതി താഴ്ത്തി കെട്ടുമെന്ന് ഏക്നാഥ് ഷിൻഡെയുടെ ഓഫീസ് പ്രസ്താവനയിൽ അറിയിച്ചു. സംസ്ഥാനത്ത് ഇന്ന് വിനോദ പരിപാടികളും ഉണ്ടാകില്ല. സംസ്ഥാന സർക്കാരിൻ്റെ ഇന്നത്തെ എല്ലാ പരിപാടികളും റദ്ദാക്കിയതായി മഹാരാഷ്ട്ര മന്ത്രി ദീപക് കേസർകർ അറിയിച്ചു. Also Read: Ratan Tata Demise: നിരത്തുകളിലെ ഇത്തിരിക്കുഞ്ഞൻ, 'നാനോ'; സാധാരണക്കാരന് വേണ്ടി രത്തൻ ടാറ്റ കണ്ട സ്വപ്നം TRENDING NOW ബുധനാഴ്ച രാത്രി 11.45ഓടെയാണ് രത്തൻ ടാറ്റയുടെ മരണം ഔദ്യോഗികമായി സ്ഥിരീകരിച്ചത്. മുംബൈയിലെ ബ്രീച്ച് കാൻഡി ആശുപത്രിയിലായിരുന്നു അന്ത്യം. 1991 മുതൽ 2012 വരെ 21 വർഷം ടാറ്റ ​ഗ്രൂപ്പ് ചെയർമാൻ ആയിരുന്നു രത്തൻ ടാറ്റ. പത്മഭൂഷൺ, പത്മവിഭൂഷൺ എന്നിവ നൽകി രാജ്യം ആദരിച്ച വ്യക്തിയായിരുന്നു അദ്ദേഹം. അതീവ ഗുരുതരാവസ്ഥയില്‍ കഴിഞ്ഞ 4 ദിവസമായി ആശുപത്രിയിൽ ചികിത്സയില്‍ കഴിയുകയായിരുന്നു അദ്ദേഹം. ആരോഗ്യനില ഭേദമാണെന്ന് ടാറ്റാ ഗ്രൂപ്പ് കഴിഞ്ഞ ദിവസം അറിയിച്ചിരുന്നുവെങ്കിലും പിന്നീട് വീണ്ടും വഷളാവുകയായിരുന്നു. രക്ത സമ്മര്‍ദ്ദം കുറഞ്ഞതിനെ തുടര്‍ന്നാണ് അദ്ദേഹത്തെ ആശുപത്രിയില്‍ പ്രവേശിപ്പിച്ചത്. കഴി‍ഞ്ഞ മൂന്നു...

title: ಇಷ್ಟಾರ್ಥ ಸಿದ್ಧಿರಸ್ತು ಎಂದು ಹರಸುವ ಈಕೆ ಭಕ್ತರ ಪಾಲಿಗೆ ತಾಯಿ ಸ್ವರೂಪಿಣಿ
content: ನವರಾತ್ರಿಯ 8ನೇ ದಿನ ಅಂದರೆ ಅಷ್ಟಮಿಯಂದು ಮಹಾಗೌರಿಯನ್ನು (Mahagauri) ಆರಾಧಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಭಕ್ತರ ಪಾಲಿಗೆ ತಾಯಿ ಸ್ವರೂಪಿಣಿಯಾಗಿರುವ ಈಕೆಯನ್ನು ಅನ್ನಪೂರ್ಣೇಶ್ವರಿ (Annapurna Devi) ಎಂದೂ ಕರೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಎತ್ತಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ಕುಳಿತಿರುವ ಈ ದೇವಿಗೆ ನಾಲ್ಕು ಕೈಗಳಿವೆ. 2024ರ ಶರನ್ನವರಾತ್ರಿ ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ 3ರಿಂದ ಆರಂಭಗೊಂಡಿದ್ದು ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ 12 ಅಂದರೆ ವಿಜಯದಶಮಿಯಂದು ಮುಕ್ತಾಯಗೊಳ್ಳಲಿದೆ. ಈ ಹಬ್ಬದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರತಿದಿನವೂ ದುರ್ಗಾದೇವಿಯ ಒಂದೊಂದು ರೂಪವನ್ನು ಪೂಜಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. ನವರಾತ್ರಿಯ 8ನೇ ದಿನ ಮಹಾಗೌರಿ ಅವತಾರವನ್ನು ಆರಾಧಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಇದನ್ನೂ ಓದಿ: Mangaluru Dasara 2024: ಕುದ್ರೋಳಿ ದಸರಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಮುದ್ದು ಶಾರದೆಯರ ಸಂಭ್ರಮ! ಮಹಾಗೌರಿ ಜತೆ ದುರ್ಗಾಷ್ಟಮಿ ಪೂಜೆ ನವರಾತ್ರಿಯ ಎಂಟನೇ ದಿನ ಅಂದರೆ ಅಷ್ಟಮಿಯಂದು ಮಹಾಗೌರಿ ಪೂಜೆ ಮತ್ತು ದುರ್ಗಾಷ್ಟಮಿ ಪೂಜೆಯನ್ನು ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಈ ದೇವಿಯನ್ನು ಅನ್ನಪೂರ್ಣೇಶ್ವರಿ ಎಂದೂ ಕರೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಇಷ್ಟಾರ್ಥ ಸಿದ್ಧಿರಸ್ತು ಎನ್ನುವ ತಾಯಿ ಮಹಾಗೌರಿಯು ತನ್ನನ್ನು ಪೂಜಿಸುವ ಭಕ್ತರಿಗೆ ತಾಯಿ ಸ್ವರೂಪಿಣಿ. ಈಕೆ ತಮ್ಮ ಭಕ್ತರಿಗೆ ಇಷ್ಟಾರ್ಥ ಸಿದ್ಧಿರಸ್ತು ಎಂದೇ ಆಶೀರ್ವದಿಸುತ್ತಾಳೆ. ಎತ್ತಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ಕುಳಿತಿರುವ ಈ ದೇವಿಗೆ ನಾಲ್ಕು ಕೈಗಳಿವೆ. ನವರಾತ್ರಿಯ ಅಷ್ಟಮಿಯಂದು ಮಹಾಗೌರಿಯನ್ನು ಗುಲಾಬಿ ಹೂವುಗಳಿಂದ ಪೂಜಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಹಾಲು, ಅನ್ನ ಮತ್ತು ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿಯನ್ನು ನೈವೇದ್ಯವಾಗಿ ನೀಡಿದರೆ ತಾಯಿ ಪ್ರಸನ್ನಳಾಗುತ್ತಾಳೆ. ಹೀಗಾಗಿ ಈ ದಿನ ಮಹಾಗೌರಿಗೆ ಹಾಲು, ಅನ್ನ, ದ್ರಾಕ್ಷಿಯನ್ನು ನೈವೇದ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಇಡಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.

title: US President Biden Holds 'Direct,' 30-Minute Call With Netanyahu
creator: Zee News
content: The US embassy in Beirut remains open and can help Americans who need emergency passports or other documentation. President Joe Biden held a "direct," 30-minute phone call with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday, their first conversation in almost two months and a chance to confer over Israel's planned response to an Iranian ballistic missile attack. "They discussed a range of issues," press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said after the call ended, characterising the conversation as an extension of discussions between US and Israeli officials about Israel's response to the Iranian attack, which Biden has said should be "proportional." A White House readout described Biden condemning "unequivocally" the Iranian missile attack, without expanding any further on the two leaders' discussion of Israel's response, which was the reason for the call and which Biden has said should not include an attack on Iranian nuclear sites. That the two leaders went 49 days without speaking amid rapidly escalating tensions in the Middle East was a sign of how fraught the relationship has become, and how distant the two leaders have become in their objectives for the region. The US is working to get Americans out of Lebanon ahead of a potential Israeli attack, White House press spokesperson Karine Jean-Pierre said on Wednesday. The US embassy in Beirut remains open and can help Americans who need emergency passports or other documentation and the US will continue to make...

title: કલેક્ટર કચેરીએ બેઠકનું આયોજન:જિલ્લા કલેક્ટર નેહા કુમારીના અધ્યક્ષ સ્થાને વિકાસ સપ્તાહ ઉજવણી અંતર્ગત બેઠક યોજાઈ
content: વડાપ્રધાન નરેન્દ્ર મોદીના નેતૃત્વમાં ગુજરાતની સફળ સર્વગ્રાહી વિકાસ યાત્રાના 23 વર્ષની સફળતાની ઉજવણી વિકાસ સપ્તાહનો પ્રારંભ તા.7/10/2024થી 15/10/2024 સુધી રાજ્યમાં વિવિધ જિલ્લાઓમાં કાર્યક્રમો યોજાશે. જે અંતર્ગત જિલ્લા કલેક્ટર નેહા કુમારીના અધ્યક્ષ સ્થ વિકાસ સપ્તાહ અંતર્ગત જિલ્લામાં થીમેટિક દિવસો, વિકાસ પદયાત્રા, સાસ્કૃતિક કાર્યક્રમ, વિકાસ પ્રદર્શન, સોશિયલ/ ડિજિટલ મીડિયા જુંબેશ, સફળતાની ગાથા, યુવા વર્ગની સહભાગિતા, કલા સ્થાપત્ય, વિકાસ રથ, ગુજરાત વિકાસ ઇનોવેશન એક્સ્પો, ગુજરાતના મહત્વના સ્થળોનું સુશોભન, ભીંતચિત્રો અને શાળાઓમાં પ્રવચનો તથા ક્વિઝનું આયોજન કરવા જિલ્લા કલેક્ટરે જણાવ્યું હતું. આ બેઠકમાં જિલ્લા વિકાસ અધિકારી સી.એલ.પટેલ, નિવાસી અધિક કલેક્ટર સી.વી.લટા, પ્રાયોજના વહીવટદાર યુવરાજ સિદ્ધાર્થ, જિલ્લા ગ્રામ વિકાસ એજન્સી નિયામક ચંદ્રિકાબેન ભાભોર, પ્રાંત અધકારીઓ, ખેતીવાડી અધિકારી, મામલતદાર સહિત સંકલન અધિકારીઓ ઉપસ્થિત રહ્યા હતા.

title: 36-year-old held for kidnapping, marrying minor in Tamil Nadu, arrested
creator: Express News Service
content: KANNIYAKUMARI: The Kanniyakumari All Women Police arrested a 36-year-old man for allegedly kidnapping and marrying a 14-year-old child, his third marriage. Sources said that Neelakandan of South Kannankulam near Parakkai was married twice. Recently, he married a 14-year-old child in his native. Upon receiving information, social welfare department officials went to South Kannankulam, when Neelakandan and his relatives fled. The Kanniyakumari All Women Police registered a case under the Prohibition of Child Marriage Act on Monday against Nellakandan and arrested him. After producing him before the court, he was lodged in prison. As his first wife died, he married for a second time. He has five children from two marriages. As Neelakandan was a tippler, he had met the minor’s parents to marry her. However, as they refused, he allegedly kidnapped the minor and married her. Sources said that the minor had just studied till Class 5. As the victim, who was rescued and sent to a children’s home, wishes to study further, the authorities are making efforts towards the same.

title: '전,란' 강동원 "19년 전 '형사'로 배운 검술..'전,란' 검술 액션 도움 받았다"
El canciller iraní viajó a Arabia Saudita para conversaciones sobre Líbano y Gaza
content: Paro de transportistas Dólar en Perú Dina Boluarte Accidente en Arequipa Andrés Hurtado Shakira EsSalud DNI Selección peruana Corte de agua P. Diddy Huracán Milton Miguel Grau Horóscopo ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Araghchi se reunió con el príncipe heredero saudita, Mohamed bin Salmán, y su homólogo Faisal bin Farhan, abordando la situación actual y la necesidad de un alto el fuego. El canciller iraní, Abbas Araghchi, viajó el miércoles a Arabia Saudita para mantener conversaciones sobre los esfuerzos para poner fin a los combates entre el ejército israelí y los grupos respaldados por Irán en Gaza y Líbano. "Espero que estas conversaciones puedan conducir a mejores condiciones para Palestina y Líbano y establecer la paz en la región", declaró Araghchi a la televisión estatal iraní a su llegada a Riad. El portavoz de la cancillería iraní, Esmail Baghaei, declaró en X que la visita de Araghchi se centraría en detener "el genocidio y la agresión del régimen israelí" y tenía como objetivo "aliviar el dolor y el sufrimiento de nuestros hermanos y hermanas de Gaza y Líbano". El canciller iraní se reunió con el dirigente de facto del reino, el príncipe heredero Mohamed bin Salmán, indicó la agencia de noticias oficial saudita SPA. title: В Японии требуют тюремный срок для россиянина, обвиняемого в обходе санкций
content: ОСАКА (Япония), 10 окт - РИА Новости. Японская прокуратура требует тюремного срока в 3,5 года для россиянина, обвиняемого в экспорте товаров в РФ в обход санкций, сторона же защиты настаивает на штрафе и замене срока на условный, если срок все же будет, передает корреспондент РИА Новости из суда. Российский предприниматель, руководитель торговой компании Astrade Андрей Сова был задержан полицией города Осака 10 июля этого года по обвинению в нарушении японского законодательства в сфере валютных операций и внешней торговли. Ему инкриминируется осуществление поставок в Россию определенной категории товаров местного производства без получения надлежащего для этого разрешения министерства экономики, торговли и промышленности Японии. Данный арест стал первым в Японии по обвинению в экспорте товаров в РФ в обход санкционного режима. Как заявила в ходе слушаний сторона обвинения, в деле россиянина "нет смягчающих обстоятельств", а само "преступление рассматривается как дерзкое". "В связи с вышеизложенным просим суд назначить наказание в виде штрафа в 5 миллионов иен (33,3 тысячи долларов по текущему курсу) для компании (Astrade - ред.) и тюремного заключения сроком в три года и шесть месяцев для обвиняемого ", - заявили представители прокуратуры. В свою очередь, адвокат россиянина настаивает на том, что "законодательная цель лишена смысла", так как действия подсудимого "не нанесли никому ущерба" и не имеют "злонамеренного умысла". "Риск повторения отсутствует. Поэтому...

title: Huragan Milton uderzył we Florydę. Dramatyczne nagrania
content: Artykuł jest aktualizowany. W Tampie wiatr jest tak silny, że popycha pojazdy — powiedział reporter CNN Boris Sanchez. Podczas huraganu Milton zerwany został dach stadionu Tropicana Field. Oko huraganu przesuwa się na wschód przez centralną Florydę. Wichury będą przemieszczać się nad zagrożonym obszarem przez wiele godzin, przynosząc silne wiatry i ulewne deszcze. Z powodu huraganu zalewane są domy znajdujące się blisko rzek. Do sieci trafia coraz więcej nagrań pokazujących mocne uderzenie huraganu. Do wczesnego popołudnia w środę linie lotnicze odwołały na Florydzie około 1900 lotów. Park tematyczny SeaWorld był zamknięty przez cały dzień, a Walt Disney World i Universal Orlando od popołudnia. Ponad 60 proc. stacji benzynowych w Tampie i St. Petersburg nie miało benzyny. Katastrofalne i zagrażające życiu nagłe powodzie, od umiarkowanych do dużych, są spodziewane w centralnej i północnej części Półwyspu Florydzkiego. Opady na tych obszarach mogą do czwartku sięgać od 15 do 30 cm, a lokalnie nawet do ponad 45 cm. Krajowa Służba Pogodowa (NWC) wydała ostrzeżenie o nagłej powodzi w St. Petersburgu, Clearwater i Largo w hrabstwie Pinellas. Śmiercionośny, sztormowy przypływ zagrażał większej części wybrzeża Zatoki Meksykańskiej, w tym gęsto zaludnionym rejonom, jak Tampy, St. Petersburgu, Sarasoty i Fort Myers. Huragan wywołał na Florydzie wiele mniejszych tornad. Do środy wieczorem trzy biura NWC w tym stanie wydały łącznie 133...

title: Unlocking the Mental Health Benefits of Meditation for Today’s Youth
content: In today’s hyper-connected, fast-paced world, stress has become an almost inevitable part of life, particularly for young people. The constant influx of information, pressures of academic and social success, and an unrelenting schedule often take a toll on the mental health of today’s youth. However, amidst these challenges, ancient practices like meditation offer a powerful solution to restore balance, peace, and mental well-being. The Power of Relaxation in a Chaotic World Ma Dhyan Prachi, a meditation facilitator at Osho Dham, highlights that “today’s fast-paced world leads to stress,” and notes how difficult it has become to truly relax. She emphasizes that relaxation is not just a luxury but a necessity if we are to experience deeper aspects of life. According to her, meditation happens as a result of “deep relaxation and awareness,” offering a gateway to a calmer, more balanced state of mind. Meditation practices like yog nidra have proven to offer immense benefits to the human mind and body. Ma Prachi points out that yog nidra has the potential to take us into deep states of meditation, allowing the mind to pause its incessant thinking. “The biggest benefit of being meditative is that the mind pauses to think nonstop,” she says, explaining how constant thinking often leads to more stress and dissatisfaction. By adopting meditative practices, young people can learn to focus on the present moment, cultivating a sense of gratitude and appreciation for what they have....

title: Best tax saving mutual funds or ELSS to invest in October 2024
content: Most taxpayers make their investments in the last three months of the financial year (January-March). Most of them look for the investment options available under Section 80C of the Income Tax Act (IT Act). The Section 80C of the Income Tax Act allows tax deduction of up to Rs 1.5 lakh in a financial year on investments in a few specified instruments. If you are trying to save taxes in this financial year, you can consider investing in tax-saving mutual funds or ELSSs. Tax -saving mutual funds or Equity Linked Savings Schemes (ELSSs) helps you to save income tax under Section 80C of the IT Act. You can invest a maximum of Rs 1.5 lakh in ELSSs and claim tax deductions on your investments every financial year. Are you interested? Also Read | 6 equity mutual funds multiplied SIP investments by 3.5x in 10 years Best MF to invest Looking for the best mutual funds to invest? Here are our recommendations. View Details » Before proceeding further, you should familiarise yourself with ELSSs. Tax saving mutual funds or ELSSs invest in stocks. Therefore, they have a very high risk. You should be aware of this aspect, especially if you are a first-time investor in equity mutual funds. Compared to your usual investments like Public Provident Fund or National Savings Certificate, etc, ELSSs do not offer guaranteed returns. You may even suffer losses in a bad market. title: Coldplay’s Hong Kong shows sell out within 90 minutes, including new HK$6,599 ticket
creator: Ambrose Li
content: Three new categories of tickets were offered on Thursday costing far more than the previously announced maximum price of HK$2,099 per ticket. These were priced at HK$2,799 for standing tickets, and HK$3,499 and HK$6,599 for seated tickets. The HK$6,599 ticket holders will be seated in the same zone as those who paid HK$2,099 but be given other perks. These include an exclusive backstage tour, pictures taken on stage by professional photographers, dedicated ushers and souvenirs. These additional offerings would not include a meet-and-greet with band members, organisers said. A Post reporter who visited the ticket booking platform Cityline at 10am when sales opened gained access to purchasing options only after a few minutes. However, most dates and price categories were listed as “limited” or indicated that there was temporarily “no ticket available”. Even when “limited” categories were selected, the website indicated that “the selected price zone cannot offer the required seats for the time being as other customers are selecting all the remaining seats”. “Ultimate Spheres Experience” tickets priced at HK$6,599 for the show on April 11 were sold out as early as 10.10am, with the HK$2,099 seats on April 9 also snapped up and only single seats were left available at the same price range on April 12 by 10.13am.

title: MLA Nagendra orchestrated Valmiki scam: ED
creator: Express News Service
content: BENGALURU: The special court to try cases against sitting and former MPs/MLAs has taken cognizance of a prosecution complaint filed by the Enforcement Directorate (ED) in connection with the alleged scam in Karnataka Maharshi Valmiki Scheduled Tribes Development Corporation Ltd. B Nagendra, Congress MLA and former minister for Scheduled Tribes Welfare, has been named as the prime accused and mastermind behind the scam. He allegedly orchestrated the scam with the help of 24 others, including his associates Satyanarayana Varma, Etakari Satyanarayana, JG Padmanabha, Nageshwar Rao, Nekkenti Nagaraj and Vijay Kumar Gowda. The ED launched its investigation on the basis of the FIRs registered by Karnataka police and CBI, which found that around Rs 89.62 crore was diverted from the bank accounts of the corporation to the fake accounts in some banks in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana and later laundered the money through shell entities. This scam came to light after Chandrashekhar, an employee of the corporation, died by suicide in May 2024, according to a press release from the ED. The ED probe revealed that based on Nagendra’s direction, the bank account of the corporation was shifted to the MG Road branch without proper authorisation, where Rs 187 cr, including Rs 43.33 cr from the Treasury under the Ganga Kalyana Scheme, was deposited in violation of government norms. This money was subsequently siphoned off through multiple shell accounts and converted into cash and bullion, the...

title: 賴清德國慶演說引熱議 網友:政見發表會嗎、沒兩國論就90分
content: 今天 國慶 日,賴清德總統上午在國慶大會發表 演說 ,他表示,中華民國和中華人民共和國互不隸屬、中華人民共和國無權代表台灣,並向各年齡層國民保證會減輕負擔、具體照顧,也會加強打詐的力道、加快打炒房的效率。PTT八卦版引起討論,網友表示,「這是 政見發表會 嗎」、「講一些做不到的」、「兩國論你還是不放棄,沒救了」。 網友表示,「他講的都是事實現況」、「國慶演說宣示打房喔,說到要做到欸」、「當總統連自己國家要如何稱呼都拿不定」、「打詐,我笑了」、「不就政見發表會」。 其他網友表示,「什麼時候台獨叫我」、「務實的台獨工作者」、「說好的抗中保台呢」、「一下台灣,一下中華民國,整天都在投機取巧」、「我以為頂多講『兩岸』互不隸屬,提到『兩國』就死當了」、「兩岸沒交情,是要用啥身分呼籲」、「中華民國國慶,管到對岸的外交路線」、「台派哭暈」。 也有網友說,「上歷史課真要錢」、「文稿都相當民進黨文膽」、「一年一度的幹話大賽」、「太感動了,我真的哭了」、「講的不錯」、「我也覺得說得很好,看起來連任沒有問題」、「以總統的高度講的還不錯」、「純論稿子的話,寫得很好」、「還可以,沒有兩國論就90分」。

title: Hezbolá aceptó un alto el fuego con Israel el día de la muerte de su líder, dice una fuente del gobierno libanés
content: Paro de transportistas Dólar en Perú Dina Boluarte Accidente en Arequipa Andrés Hurtado Shakira EsSalud DNI Selección peruana Corte de agua P. Diddy Huracán Milton Miguel Grau Horóscopo ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias El acuerdo fue comunicado el 27 de septiembre a través del presidente del Parlamento, Nabih Berri. Hasta ese momento, Hezbolá condicionaba su aceptación al cese de combates en Gaza. Hezbolá informó a las autoridades libanesas que aceptaba el acuerdo de alto el fuego con Israel el día en que su líder Hasán Nasralá fue asesinado en un ataque israelí, dijo el miércoles a la AFP una fuente del gobierno libanés. Hasta entonces, la poderosa formación apoyada por Irán condicionaba cualquier alto el fuego en Líbano al cese de los combates en Gaza entre su aliado palestino, Hamás, y el ejército israelí. Hezbolá abrió un frente en el sur del Líbano contra Israel hace un año para apoyar a Hamás, cuyos ataques del 7 de octubre en el país hebreo desencadenaron la guerra en Gaza. "El 27 de septiembre, Hezbolá informó oficialmente al Gobierno libanés, a través del presidente del Parlamento, Nabih Berri, que aceptaba la iniciativa internacional de alto el fuego", afirmó esta fuente, que no quiso ser identificada. title: Increased RCMP presence in Whitewood over robbery with firearm
creator: Cole Davenport
content: Saskatchewan RCMP say a larger police presence in Whitewood is related to a report of robbery with a firearm. No injuries have been reported in relation to the robbery. In a news release issued Wednesday night, RCMP said police were searching for two suspects that may be armed and dangerous. The suspects were last seen driving down the old Highway 1 east of Whitewood and were now believed to be on foot. One suspect is described as a man who may have been wearing a green shirt. A description was not available for the second suspect, but both were described as having a slim build. “We are asking the public to report any suspicious activity or people in the Whitewood area to police. Please ensure your vehicle and house doors are locked. Report any suspicious activity to police immediately,” RCMP said. Police say area residents can expect to see an increased police presence in the area as the investigation continues. “We will provide an update when we have more information available. If an imminent risk to public safety is identified, we will notify the public,” the release said. Whitewood is located approximately 175 kilometres east of Regina, along the Trans-Canada Highway.

title: فور/ی وقوع حادثه دریایی در حدیده یمن
content: منابع خبری بامداد امروز (پنجشنبه) از وقوع حادثه دریایی جدید در آب‌های یمن خبر دادند. اداره عملیات تجارت دریایی انگلیس (UKMTO) بامداد امروز اعلام کرد که گزارشی از یک حادثه دریایی در ۷۰ مایلی جنوب غربی الحدیده در یمن دریافت کرده است. گفتنی است که تا لحظه مخابره این خبر، ارتش یمن در ارتباط با عملیات‌های خود علیه کشتی‌های اسرائیلی یا کشتی‌های مرتبط با این رژیم بیانیه‌ای صادر نکرده است.

title: Family Feud: Team Eigenmann vs. PEP Troika
2025 Life Time Grand Prix introduces wild cards, event changes and tightened roster
creator: simone.giuliani@futurenet.com
Simone Giuliani
content: The Life Time Grand Prix series may still have the final event of 2024 to play out, but attention is already turning to what’s ahead for 2025, with some shifts to the format announced that organisers are hoping will add another layer in the year ahead. Shifts that will make the series look a little different next season are athlete numbers – which will drop to 25 women and 25 men – a selection that includes three wildcard entries after two events and some changes to which races are included. “We’re excited to announce these updates to the 2025 Life Time Grand Prix as we believe it will make the fourth edition of the series the most dynamic one yet,” Kimo Seymour, Life Time President Media & Events said in a media release announcing the plans for 2025. “We’re just wrapping up the 2024 series - only our third season - but we’ve already seen immense progress in our goal of bringing more fans and growing the sport of cycling domestically. From continually sold out events to the success of our Life Time Grand Prix Race Highlights recap video series on YouTube, it is clear the appetite for professional and recreational off-road cycling in the U.S. is continuing to grow.” What won't be continuing to grow, however is the event numbers, with a reshuffle of what is included resulting in a six event competition, with five starts necessary to be eligible for the prize money and the top five event results determining the series placings. title: Florida braces for monster Hurricane Milton
content: Sarasota, (APP - UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 10th Oct, 2024) Hurricane Milton closed in on Wednesday, unleashing tornadoes and threatening a wide swath of the state with life-threatening flooding, as residents made last-minute preparations for impact and the country's politicians sparred over relief efforts. Tidal surges are expected to inundate the heavily populated and low-lying Gulf Coast, with the cities of and bracing for a direct hit, amid rising fears of widespread chaos and possible fatalities. Milton, now a strong Category 3 hurricane, is then expected to rip through inland areas to the Atlantic Ocean, with tourist -- home to Walt Disney -- in its path. In , as the rain intensified, streets were increasingly deserted, with most businesses shuttered and sandbagged for protection. Residents sought refuge at evacuation centers. "I am nervous. This is something we just went through with the other -- ground saturated, still recovering that," Randy Prior, who owns a pool , told AFP. Prior, 36, says he plans to ride out the at home, after recently toughing out Helene, which sparked flooding in before wreaking havoc across remote areas further inland such as in western North Carolina. title: ‘Depraved ideology’: Terrorist smiles after being jailed over Islamic State pledge
creator: Tara Cosoleto
content: A convicted terrorist who pledged allegiance to Islamic State after lighting bushfires could be released from prison in just under three years. Aran Sherani, 22, looked down and smiled after he was sentenced in the Victorian Supreme Court on Thursday morning. Aran Sherani outside court in 2023. Credit: Simon Schluter Sherani was found guilty in 2023 of preparing a terrorist act after declaring his allegiance to Islamic State and threatening to die as a martyr in a March 2021 video. Police arrived to arrest him at his home in Melbourne’s north, but he ran away and bought a knife, which he held up during the video. Justice Amanda Fox said Sherani intended to threaten police with the knife, rather than planning to actually stab them. “While the plan remained afoot, you were committed to its execution,” Fox said in her sentencing remarks. “However, you voluntarily abandoned the plan and the ultimate arrest was made without resistance.” Sherani was also filmed lighting two bushfires in February 2021, where he stated he would burn down cities and punish non-believers. The Supreme Court jury acquitted Sherani of attempting to commit terrorist acts by lighting the bushfires, but he did plead guilty to being a member of a terrorist organisation. Fox said the fires showed the lengths Sherani was prepared to go to in his support of Islamic State. “You embraced a depraved ideology and sought to advance the ideology through your own actions,” the judge said. title: Lisa Marie Presley fue abusada cuando tenía 10 años, según sus memorias
content: Lisa Marie Presley afirmó en sus nuevas memorias ‘ From Here to the Great Unknow n’, ‘De aquí a lo desconocido’ en español, que el exnovio de su mamá, Mike Edwards, abusó de ella cuando tenía solo 10 años. La hija del conocido cantante, Elvis Presley, falleció en enero de 2023. Confesó en su libro, el cual ya está disponible, que Edwards —que apareció en la película de 1981 ‘Mommie Dearest’ como el amante de Joan Crawford— entró en su habitación en mitad de la noche y le pasó un dedo por la pierna. “Dijo que me iba a enseñar lo que me iba a pasar cuando fuera mayor” , escribió Lisa Marie, que tenía 10 años en ese momento. A post shared by People Magazine (@people) “ Puso su mano sobre mi pecho y dijo que un hombre me va a tocar aquí, allí, puso su mano entre mis piernas y dijo que me van a tocar aquí. Creo que me besó suavemente y luego se fue esa noche”, escribe la hija del fallecido Elvis Presley. Según lo que reseña Page Six, Lisa, al día siguiente, le informó a su mamá y ella le aseguró que Edward quería disculparse con ella. “Edwards estaba sentado en su cama, luciendo muy malhumorado y hosco... dijo: ‘Lo siento mucho, pero en Europa así es como les enseñan a los niños , así que eso era lo que estaba haciendo’”, afirmó Lisa en su libro. La hija de Elvis Presley, quien tuvo, durante toda su vida, una relación complicada con su mamá, Priscilla, insinuó que no sintió el apoyo de su madre y que ella no se puso de su lado cuando el...

title: Florida seaside haven a ghost town as hurricane nears
content: Sarasota, (APP - UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 10th Oct, 2024) The normally pleasant seaside town of looked deserted Wednesday, with most of its residents gone or seeking shelter as dangerous Hurricane Milton rumbled toward . The town of 57,000 people sits on a bay connected to the Gulf of and in normal times its prime location is a lure for visitors. But these are anything but normal times: Hurricane Helene hit two weeks ago, doing major damage, and next comes Milton -- a monstrous packing 130 mph winds and potential for a coastal surge of 15 feet (4.5 meters). is one of many cities and towns along the west coast of that are girding for Milton, which is expected to make landfall overnight Wednesday into Thursday. Brad Reeves, a 55-year-old building inspector, took a walk along the bay in the morning to have one last look before hunkering down in his apartment, in a modern building several miles the coast. "This situation really rattles your nerves," Reeves told AFP. "You have moments where you're excited, moments where you're scared, moments where you just can't sleep. Everything is just topsy-turvy." Out in the bay, a boat that crashed into the pier of a seaside restaurant less than two weeks ago during Hurricane Helene is still stuck there.

title: El dulce discurso de Paco Torreblanca
creator: Alicia, Martí
content: El pastelero alicantino Paco Torreblanca fue el encargado de hablar en nombre de todos los galardonados con las Distinciones del 9 d’Octubre . «No es poca cosa hacer un postre en forma de discurso para un menú de nombres tan distinguidos, que han aportado tanto y tan bueno». La responsabilidad, admitió, le pesaba, especialmente después de que el escritor Ferran Torrent fuese el portavoz de las distinciones entregadas en el ámbito cultural y de las letras en un acto celebrado en Alicante y que, por primera vez se separaba del central para llevarlo fuera de Valencia. La historiadora Amparo Cabanes recibió la Alta Distinción de la Generalitat y el exministro y exeurodiputado del PP José Manuel García-Margallo la Distinción al Mérito Lluís Vives. También fueron reconocidos el conserje del edificio incendiado en el barrio de Campanar, Julián García Antón , junto a los servicios de emergencias, seguridad y protección civil. Así mismo, el investigador de la Universitat Politècnica de València Luis Guanter, recibió la Distinción al Mérito Científico y la presidenta de Caixa La Vall, María Lourdes Falcó , al Mérito empresarial y social. El mismo galardón se le ha concedido a la empresa Stomvi Instrumentos Musicales (Honiba S.A), mientras que los premios al Mérito deportivo han sido para el paralímpico Enrique Alhambra y los olímpicos Abel Ruiz Ortega , Cristhian Andrey, Vega Gimeno, Sandra Ygueravide Viana, Sara Sorribes y el Valencia Club de Hockey....

title: 國際地緣政治紛擾 賴總統喊話對岸共同維護區域和平
content: 對於兩岸的論述,賴總統10日於國慶典禮上再度提到,無論喜歡稱呼「我們自己的國家,是中華民國、是台灣、還是中華民國台灣,我們都要有共同的信念」,捍衛國家主權的決心不變、維持台海和平穩定現狀的努力不變、希望兩岸對等尊嚴,健康有序對話交流的承諾不變。 賴總統在致詞的一開始先是提到,113年前,一群充滿理想抱負的人,揭竿起義、推翻帝制,他們的夢想是,建立一個民有、民治、民享的民主共和國;他們的理想是,打造一個自由、平等、博愛的國度,然而,民主的夢想,曾經在熊熊戰火中被吞噬;自由的理想,長年在威權統治中被侵蝕,但是,也永遠不會忘記,75年前的古寧頭戰役、66年前的八二三戰役,我們不分先來後到,不分族群你我,守住了台澎金馬,守住了中華民國,更永遠不會忘記,45年前的「美麗島事件」,以及前前後後一連串的民主運動,一批批同樣懷有民主夢想、自由理想的人,無畏犧牲,前仆後繼,用生命推開民主的大門,一百多年來,人民想要當家作主的願望,終於實現。 賴總統說,現在,中華民國已經在台澎金馬落地生根,和中華人民共和國互不隸屬;民主自由,在這塊土地上,成長茁壯,中華人民共和國無權代表台灣;兩千三百萬台灣人民,更要向全世界開枝散葉,迎向未來。「身為總統,我的使命是,維護國家生存發展,團結兩千三百萬台灣人民;並且,堅持國家主權不容侵犯併吞。」 賴總統也說,台灣有決心致力維護台海的和平穩定,成就全球的安全和繁榮,也願意和中國大陸共同因應氣候變遷、防堵傳染病,以及維護區域安全,追求和平共榮,為兩岸人民帶來福祉。長期以來,世界各國支持中國大陸、投資中國大陸,以及協助中國大陸加入「世界貿易組織」,促進了中國大陸的經濟發展、國力的提升,無非就是期待中國大陸一起為世界帶來貢獻,對內重視民生、對外維護和平。 賴總統更提到,當前國際緊張情勢不斷升高,每日皆有無數的無辜人民死傷於戰火中,希望中國大陸回應國際社會的期待,能夠發揮影響力,和世界各國共同努力,結束俄烏戰爭和中東衝突,也和台灣一起承擔國際責任,對區域和全球的和平、安全與繁榮,做出貢獻。

title: US judge ‘allows new evidence’ in Aafia Siddiqui case
creator: none@none.com (Anwar Iqbal)
content: WASHINGTON: A US judge has granted the legal team of Dr Aafia Siddiqui , sentenced for allegedly attacking US personnel, access to new and confidential evidence that could potentially strengthen a clemency request. The order, issued by US District Judge Richard M. Berman, allows Ms Siddiqui’s lawyers to access crucial discovery materials, which date back to 2009, under strict conditions as they contain information that “could... pose a threat to public safety and the national security” if improperly disclosed. Clive Stafford Smith, one of the lawyers actively advocating for Ms Siddiqui’s release, expressed optimism about the new material, saying he had retrieved “compelling new evidence about the ‘Black Site’ where Aafia was held after time in the Bagram isolation cells.” Separately, Mr Smith filed a 56,600-word clemency petition, aiming to highlight the complexities and injustices surrounding Ms Siddiqui’s case. The legal team based the motion on a statute that allows a person in federal custody to challenge their conviction or sentence on specific grounds, including: the sentence violates the US Constitution or federal law; the court that imposed the sentence lacked jurisdiction; and/or the sentence exceeded the maximum authorised by law. Such a motion is typically filed in the court that sentenced the individual. It serves as a post-conviction remedy similar to a federal habeas corpus petition, but is specifically used for federal prisoners. Another statute quoted in the...

title: Child marriage victim’s baby to get assistance from TN government
creator: Express News Service
content: KRISHNAGIRI: The district child protection unit plans to enrol a female baby whose 14-year-old mother died after delivery, under a sponsorship programme. The child will receive Rs 4,000 per month till she turns 18. On October 3, TNIE published a report about the near Bidiretty in Kelamangalam block. Following this, Krishnagiri District Child Protection Officer D Saravanan, and District Social Welfare Officer R Sakthi Subhashini visited the tribal villages. Kelamangalam police also inquired into the matter. Saravanan told TNIE, “After the death of Saranya (name changed), her female baby will be enrolled under the Mission Vatsalya sponsorship programme. She will get monthly financial assistance of Rs 4,000 till she reaches the age of 18. Also child protection unit will get a birth certificate for the baby. We were unable to DNA match the father of the baby.” Anti-child marriage awareness programmes will be conducted at Bidiretty and Jakkeri panchayats. The child protection unit will inquire about the functioning of the Village Level Child Protection Committee (VLCPC) in both panchayats. DSWO Sakthi Subhashini told TNIE that steps are being taken to file a case against Saranya’s husband.

title: देश की खबरें | उद्योगपति टाटा का निधन भारतीय उद्योग और समाज के लिए अपूरणीय क्षति: ममता बनर्जी
content: मुंबई, 10 अक्टूबर पश्चिम बंगाल की मुख्यमंत्री ममता बनर्जी ने बृहस्पतिवार को उद्योगपति रतन टाटा के निधन पर शोक व्यक्त किया और इसे भारतीय व्यापार तथा समाज के लिए अपूरणीय क्षति बताया। बनर्जी ने सोशल मीडिया मंच ‘एक्स’ पर एक पोस्ट में कहा, ‘‘उनका निधन भारतीय व्यापार जगत और समाज के लिए एक अपूरणीय क्षति है।’’ तमिलनाडु के मुख्यमंत्री एम. के स्टालिन ने टाटा को भारतीय उद्योग जगत का सच्चा रत्न और विनम्रता एवं करुणा का प्रतीक बताया। स्टालिन ने कहा, ‘‘उनके दूरदर्शी नेतृत्व ने न केवल टाटा समूह को आकार दिया, बल्कि नैतिक व्यावसायिक प्रथाओं के लिए एक वैश्विक मानदंड भी स्थापित किया। राष्ट्र निर्माण, नवाचार और परोपकार के प्रति उनके अथक समर्पण ने लाखों लोगों के जीवन पर अमिट छाप छोड़ी है।’’ केंद्रीय सूचना एवं प्रसारण मंत्रालय ने कहा कि राष्ट्र टाटा की विरासत को सदैव संजोकर रखेगा। मंत्रालय ने उन्हें एक दूरदर्शी नेता बताया। अभिनेता सलमान खान ने कहा कि वह रतन टाटा के निधन से बहुत दुखी हैं। अभिनेता राणा दग्गुबाती ने कहा कि रतन टाटा नेतृत्व, परोपकार और नैतिकता के प्रतीक थे और उनकी विरासत पीढ़ियों को प्रेरित करती रहेगी। अभिनेता रितेश देशमुख ने भी टाटा के निधन पर शोक व्यक्त करते हुए कहा कि उनके जैसा व्यक्ति दोबारा पाना संभव नहीं है और वह उनके निधन से बहुत दुखी हैं। अभिनेत्री सिमी ग्रेवाल ने कहा कि इस क्षति को सहन करना बहुत कठिन है और उन्होंने टाटा को विदाई संदेश भेजा। रतन टाटा (86) ने मुंबई के एक अस्पताल में अंतिम सांस ली और वह इस अस्पताल में पिछले कुछ दिनों से भर्ती थे। (यह सिंडिकेटेड न्यूज़ फीड से अनएडिटेड और ऑटो-जेनरेटेड स्टोरी है, ऐसी संभावना है कि लेटेस्टली स्टाफ द्वारा इसमें कोई बदलाव या एडिट...

title: Ratan Tata: শিল্পপতি রতন টাটার দেহাবসান, শেষ শ্রদ্ধা জানাতে বাসভবনে প্রাক্তন ভারতীয় ক্রিকেটার শচীন টেন্ডুলকার
content: উৎসবের আবহে বিষাদের সুর। চলে গেলেন । গত ৯ অক্টোবর রাতে মুম্বইয়ের ব্রিচ ক্যান্ডি হাসপাতালে তাঁর দেহাবসান হয়। তাঁর মৃত্যুতে একদিনের শোক দিবস ঘোষণা হয়েছে মহারাষ্ট্রে। আজ সকালে শেষ শ্রদ্ধা জানাতে শিল্পপতি রতন টাটার কোলাবার বাসভবনে পৌঁছেছেন প্রাক্তন ভারতীয় ক্রিকেটার শচীন টেন্ডুলকার। দেখুন সেই ছবি- #WATCH | Mumbai | Former Indian Cricketer Sachin Tendulkar arrives at Colaba residence of industrialist Ratan Tata to pay his last respects pic.twitter.com/xwpaDqHfO4 — ANI (@ANI) October 10, 2024 রতন টাটার বাসভবন ছাড়লেন শচিন #WATCH | Former Indian Cricketer Sachin Tendulkar leaves from the residence of industrialist Ratan Tata in Mumbai's Colaba pic.twitter.com/D24TfK3WLv — ANI (@ANI) October 10, 2024 (টুইটার, ইনস্টাগ্রাম এবং ইউটিউব সহ সোশাল মিডিয়া থেকে আপনার কাছে সর্বশেষতম ব্রেকিং নিউজ, ভাইরাল ট্রেন্ডস এবং ইনফরমেশন নিয়ে আসে SocialLY। উপরের পোস্টটি ব্যবহারকারীর সোশাল মিডিয়া অ্যাকাউন্ট থেকে সরাসরি এম্বেড করা হয়েছে এবং লেটেস্টলি এতে কোনও সংশোধন বা সম্পাদনা করেনি। সোশাল মিডিয়া পোস্টের মতামত এবং তথ্য লেটেস্টলি-র মতামতকে প্রতিফলিত করে না। লেটেস্টলি এর জন্য কোনও দায়বদ্ধতা বা দায় গ্রহণ করে না।)
