title: [사진]김신록,'아름다운 등장'
Ratan Tata Net Worth: ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਆਪਣੇ ਪਿੱਛੇ ਛੱਡ ਗਏ ਕਿੰਨੀ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ, ਕੌਣ ਬਣੇਗਾ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦਾ ਉੱਤਰਾਧਿਕਾਰੀ? ਪੂਰੀ ਡਿਟੇਲ ਇੱਥੇ
creator: ABP Sanjha
content: Ratan Tata Net Worth : ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ ਵਪਾਰ ਜਗਤ ਤੋਂ ਇਸ ਸਮੇਂ ਦੀ ਇੱਕ ਬਹੁਤ ਹੀ ਦੁਖਦਾਈ ਖਬਰ ਸਾਹਮਣੇ ਆਈ ਹੈ। ਦੇਸ਼ ਦੇ ਪ੍ਰਮੁੱਖ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰੀ ਟਾਟਾ ਗਰੁੱਪ ਦੇ ਮੁਖੀ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦਾ ਦਿਹਾਂਤ ਹੋ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ। 86 ਸਾਲਾ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ (Ratan Tata) ਦੀ ਸਿਹਤ ਪਿਛਲੇ ਕੁਝ ਦਿਨਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਵਿਗੜ ਰਹੀ ਸੀ। ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦਾ ਮੁੰਬਈ ਦੇ ਬ੍ਰੀਚ ਕੈਂਡੀ ਹਸਪਤਾਲ 'ਚ ਇਲਾਜ ਚੱਲ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ। ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੇ ਦਿਹਾਂਤ 'ਤੇ ਵਪਾਰ ਜਗਤ 'ਚ ਸੋਗ ਦੀ ਲਹਿਰ ਹੈ। ਆਓ ਜਾਣਦੇ ਹਾਂ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਕਿੰਨੀ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਦੇ ਮਾਲਿਕ ਸਨ। ਹੋਰ ਪੜ੍ਹੋ : ਫਲਾਈਟ ਨੂੰ ਉਡਾਉਂਦੇ ਸਮੇਂ ਪਾਇਲਟ ਦੀ ਹੋਈ ਮੌ*ਤ, ਯਾਤਰੀਆਂ ਦੇ ਸਾਹ ਰੁਕੇ, ਜਾਣੋ ਅੱਗੇ ਕੀ ਹੋਇਆ? ਟਾਟਾ ਸੂਈ ਤੋਂ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਜਹਾਜ਼ ਤੱਕ ਸਭ ਕੁੱਝ ਬਣਾਉਂਦਾ ਹੈ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ ਵੱਡੇ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰੀਆਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਗਿਣੇ ਜਾਂਦੇ ਹਨ। ਸ਼ਾਇਦ ਹੀ ਕੋਈ ਅਜਿਹਾ ਘਰ ਹੋਵੇਗਾ ਜਿਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਟਾਟਾ ਦਾ ਸਮਾਨ ਨਾ ਵਰਤਿਆ ਗਿਆ ਹੋਵੇ। ਟਾਟਾ ਬਾਰੇ ਕਹਾਵਤ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਸੂਈ ਤੋਂ ਜਹਾਜ਼ ਤੱਕ। ਮਤਲਬ ਟਾਟਾ ਸੂਈਆਂ ਤੋਂ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਜਹਾਜ਼ ਤੱਕ ਸਭ ਕੁਝ ਬਣਾਉਂਦਾ ਹੈ। ਹੁਣ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੀ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ 'ਤੇ ਆਉਂਦੇ ਹਾਂ। ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੀ ਕੁੱਲ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ - ਲਗਭਗ 3800 ਕਰੋੜ ਰੁਪਏ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੀ ਕੁੱਲ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਦੀ ਗੱਲ ਕਰੀਏ ਤਾਂ ਉਹ ਲਗਭਗ 3800 ਕਰੋੜ ਰੁਪਏ ਦੇ ਮਾਲਕ ਹਨ। ਹਾਲਾਂਕਿ ਇਹ ਰਿਪੋਰਟ ਦੋ ਸਾਲ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਦੀ ਹੈ। 2022 ਵਿੱਚ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੀ ਕੁੱਲ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ 3800 ਕਰੋੜ ਰੁਪਏ ਸੀ। ਉਹ IIFL ਵੈਲਥ ਹੁਰੁਨ ਇੰਡੀਅਨ ਰਿਚ ਲਿਸਟ ਵਿੱਚ 421ਵੇਂ ਸਥਾਨ 'ਤੇ ਸੀ। ਆਮਦਨ ਦਾ ਵੱਡਾ ਹਿੱਸਾ ਚੈਰਿਟੀ ਵਿੱਚ ਖਰਚ ਕਰਦੇ ਸਨ ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਆਪਣੀ ਆਮਦਨ ਦਾ ਵੱਡਾ ਹਿੱਸਾ ਦਾਨ ਕਰਦੇ ਸਨ। ਇਹੀ ਕਾਰਨ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਕੁੱਲ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਉਸ ਦੇ ਕੱਦ ਅਤੇ ਕੰਪਨੀ ਦੇ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਦੇ ਮੁਕਾਬਲੇ ਘੱਟ ਹੈ। ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਇੱਕ ਵਪਾਰੀ ਦੇ ਨਾਲ-ਨਾਲ ਇੱਕ ਪਰਉਪਕਾਰੀ ਵਜੋਂ ਵੀ ਮਸ਼ਹੂਰ ਹੋਏ। ਟਾਟਾ ਟਰੱਸਟ ਬਣਾ ਕੇ, ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ ਆਪਣੀ ਕਮਾਈ ਦਾ ਵੱਡਾ ਹਿੱਸਾ ਚੈਰਿਟੀ 'ਤੇ ਖਰਚ ਕੀਤਾ। ਟਾਟਾ ਟਰੱਸਟ ਸਿਹਤ ਸੰਭਾਲ, ਸਿੱਖਿਆ ਅਤੇ ਪੇਂਡੂ ਵਿਕਾਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਕੰਮ ਕਰਦਾ ਹੈ। ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦਾ ਉੱਤਰਾਧਿਕਾਰੀ ਕੌਣ ਹੈ? ਰਤਨ ਟਾਟਾ ਦੀ ਕੋਈ ਔਲਾਦ ਨਹੀਂ...

title: Cómo se puede desarrollar el sector externo para que la economía crezca exponencialmente
content: Perú sorprende por su dinamismo en lo que respecta al sector externo de su economía, la proyección hacia el exterior, su posicionamiento global, y la infraestructura relativa al comercio exterior. Para empezar, podemos mencionar que en los 8 primeros meses del año Perú exportó por poco menos de US$47 billones, lo cual proyectado a fin de año llegaría a más de US$70 billones, siendo sus principales destinos China (35%), EEUU (13%), y la Unión Europea (11%). No sólo tiene aún un 41% de las exportaciones atomizadas en el mercado global, sino que el 59% se concentra justamente en 3 megamercados con lo cual Perú ha celebrado acuerdos de libre comercio . Justamente se trata de aquellos bloques económicos que el Mercosur no logra avanzar en ningún acuerdo concreto, además de otros de menor importancia relativa como lo que Perú tiene con Canadá, Japón, Alianza del Pacífico o EFTA, por sólo nombrar algunos. Adicionalmente, este país estará inaugurando hacia fines de año la mega-terminal marítima de Chancay ubicada a escasos 80 km al norte de Lima , la cual ha sido financiada y construida en un 60% por COSCO Shipping de China y que se presenta como un serio candidato a operar como un verdadero hub para el mercado de la costa oeste de Sudamérica . Se trata de 15 sitios de atraque con un calado operativo a costado de muelle de 17 metros el cual le permitirá operar buques de hasta 18.000 Teus de capacidad, además de buques multi-propósito y buques RO/RO para...

Ratan Tata Death, Last Rites LIVE UPDATES: State Funeral For The Industrialist
creator: Reema Sharma
content: Ratan Tata Death Live Updates: The Maharashtra government has announced that the Ratan Tata would be accorded a funeral with full state honours in the evening. New Delhi: Ratan Tata, the esteemed chairman emeritus of Tata Sons, breathed his last on Wednesday at Mumbai's Breach Candy Hospital. Tata was admitted in the hospital on Monday for certain age-related health issues. The body of the industrial legend will be kept for people to pay their last respects at the NCPA Lawns at Nariman Point, before taking it for a state funeral in Worli. The Maharashtra government has announced that the late industrialist would be accorded a funeral with full state honours in the evening. Chief Minister of Maharashtra Eknath Shinde has confirmed that Tata will be given state funeral. "The precious gem of the country is lost. Ratanji Tata was a unique and ideal amalgamation of ethics and entrepreneurship. Ratanji Tata was a living legend who successfully took over the reins of the Tata Group, which has a tradition of excellence and integrity of nearly 150 years. The decision making ability and mental strength that he displayed from time to time, took the Tata Group to different industrial heights. I pay my heartfelt tribute to him. Ratanji Tata was the pride of India, he will always remain a role model for the coming generation of entrepreneurs," the Maharashtra CM wrote on X. The state has also declared a day-long official mourning in memory of the business titan. Stay Tuned With Zee News...

title: दिल्ली: दुर्गा पूजा कार्यक्रम में रुका झूला तो अटकी सांसें, हवा में लटके रहे लोग
content: Feedback दिल्ली के शाहदरा में दुर्गा पूजा के कार्यक्रम में लगा एक विशाल झूला अचानक अटक गया और उसपर बैठे लोग कुछ देर तक लटके रहे. कथित तौर पर लगभग दो मिनट तक झूला रुका रहा और लोग हवा में फंसे रहे. इस दौरान लोगों में दहशत फैल गई. दु्र्गा पूजा का समय है और देशभर में लोग दशहरा मेला से लेकर दुर्गा पंडाल देखने के लिए घरों से निकल रहे हैं. मेलों में खाने पीने की चीजों से लेकर झूले तक लोगों को खूब आकर्षित कर रहे हैं. ऐसे में भीड़भाड़ के चलते दुर्घटनाओं की रिस्क भी बढ़ जाता है. हाल में दिल्ली के शहादरा में ऐसा ही कुछ हुआ. यहां दुर्गा पूजा के कार्यक्रम में लगा एक विशाल झूला अचानक अटक गया और उसपर बैठे लोग कुछ देर तक लटके रहे. घटना का वीडियो सोशल मीडिया पर काफी वायरल हो रहा है. यह घटना सोमवार को कड़कड़डूमा के सीबीडी ग्राउंड में आयोजित श्री बालाजी रामलीला मेले में हुई, जहां एक बड़ा झूला, जिसे हथौड़ा जॉयराइड के नाम से जाना जाता है, कथित तौर पर लगभग दो मिनट तक रुका रहा और लोग हवा में फंसे रहे. इस दौरान लोगों में दहशत फैल गई. पुलिस के अनुसार, झूले के दोनों तरफ वजन के बराबर वजन के कारण सवारी रुक गई, प्रत्येक तरफ 16 लोग थे. एक पुलिस अधिकारी ने कहा, 'इसमें कोई मशीनी खराबी नहीं थी'. घटना के बाद, दिल्ली नगर निगम (एमसीडी) ने कड़कड़डूमा सहित चार रामलीला कार्यक्रमों में झूलों का गहन निरीक्षण किया. पुलिस ने कहा कि एमसीडी की तकनीकी टीम को कोई यांत्रिक समस्या नहीं मिली और सवारी को निरंतर उपयोग के लिए मंजूरी दे दी गई है. पुलिस ने बताया कि किसी के घायल होने की सूचना नहीं है और निरीक्षण के तुरंत बाद सवारी फिर से शुरू हो गई. सम्बंधित ख़बरें सबसे तेज़ ख़बरों के लिए आजतक ऐप

title: Vettaiyan Twitter Review: Netizens Call Rajinikanth, Amitabh Bachchan And Fahadh Faasil's Movie 'Best Crime Thriller'
content: Vettaiyan Twitter Review: Directed by TJ Gnanavel, the action drama featuring an impressive cast, including Rajinikanth, Amitabh Bachchan, Dushara Vijayan, Ritika Singh, Manju Warrier, Fahadh Faasil, Rana Daggubati, Abhirami, Rakshan, Rohini, Rao Ramesh, and Ramesh Thilak. The film's score is composed by Anirudh Ravichander and it marks Rajinikanth’s 70th film. Vettaiyan is available in Tamil, Telugu, Hindi, and Malayalam, and had its premiere in the US last night. Fans started gathering at theaters the night before to kick off the festivities for Vettaiyan. The celebrations are lively, adorned with huge cutouts, banners, and spectacular fireworks, all reflecting the joy and devotion for their beloved Superstar. Special screenings in packed theaters have fans cheering, dancing, and throwing confetti each time Rajinikanth appears on screen. Social media is alive with fan tributes, videos, and heartfelt messages, demonstrating their deep admiration for his performance. Those who have seen the film are now sharing their reviews. A user wrote, "#Vettaiyan 1st Half - Terrific Screen Play than #Jailer #Rajinikanth acting #Anirudh Once again proves why he is the goat, Good Song Placement, Best Crime thriller Film, Interval Scene Twist is amazing #VettaiyanReview." title: La UCO encuentra "secretos oficiales" en posesión del guardia civil de la trama Koldo
content: Los agentes de la Unidad Central Operativa (UCO) de la Guardia Civil han advertido al juez que instruye el caso Koldo , Ismael Moreno , de que "todo el material intervenido" al comandante de la Guardia Civil Rubén Villalba , quien antes de ser imputado estaba destinado en la Embajada española de Caracas (Venezuela), " contiene información susceptible de estar amparada en la mencionada clasificación de secreto ", según especifica un informe de 7 de octubre, al que ha tenido acceso esta redacción. Y este es el motivo, explican los autores del oficio policial, por el que varios "elementos referenciados" y otros "anexos" al informe sobre el contenido de los teléfonos de este comandante de la Guardia Civil, " han sido cercenados [...] atendiendo al principio de prudencia y reserva ". En concreto, los agentes se refieren a la Ley de Secretos Oficiales 9/1968, que establece que podrán ser declaradas materias "clasificadas los asuntos, actos, documentos, informaciones, datos y objetos cuyo conocimiento por personas no autorizadas pueda dañar o poner en riesgo la seguridad y la defensa del Estado". Sin embargo, esta ley destaca que la calificación de secreta debe decretarla el Consejo de Ministros . Los agentes justifican su decisión porque el agente Rubén Villalba, a quien se le acusa de haber suministrado teléfonos seguros al que fuera asesor de José Luis Ábalos en Ministerio de Transportes, Koldo García Izaguirre , estaba destinado desde 2008 en el Grupo de...

title: Shakib Al Hasan Issues Public Apology For ‘Silence’ On Bangladesh Protests, Aims For Farewell Match At Home
creator: ABP News Bureau
content: Shakib Al Hasan, the star Bangladesh all-rounder, took to social media to issue an apology to the people of Bangladesh for remaining silent over the protests that were carried out in the country which eventually led to the fall of the Awami League-led government, in which Shakib was a member of parliament (MP). He also offered condolences to those who lost their lives during the political turmoil that Bangladesh suffered from. Notably, Shakib Al Hasan also expressed his desire to play his last international match for Bangladesh in front of the home crowd, something that seemed like a distant dream before his public apology. ALSO ON ABP Live | Women's T20 World Cup 2024 Group A & Group B Points Tables After SA vs SCO, IND vs SL Matches Bangladesh take on South Africa in the 1st Test of the two-match series,commencing from October 21. "At first, I respectfully remember all the students who sacrificed their lives or were injured while leading the anti-discrimination student movement. I offer my deepest respect and condolences to them and their families. Although no sacrifice can ever fully compensate for the loss of loved ones, the pain of losing a child or a brother is irreplaceable," Shakib wrote in his official Facebook post on October 9 (Wednesday). "For those of you who felt hurt or disappointed by my silence during this critical time, I sincerely apologies acknowledging your feelings. If I were in your position, perhaps I would have felt the same way," he added. Here's...

title: Giancarlo Stanton hits go-ahead homer in the eighth, Yankees beat Royals
creator: Associated Press
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. — Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning amid a battle of the bullpens, and the New York Yankees beat the Kansas City Royals 3-2 on Wednesday night in Game 3 of their AL Division Series at Kauffman Stadium. Stanton finished with three hits, drove in two runs and stole a base for the first time in four years for the Yankees, who will turn to six-time All-Star pitcher Gerrit Cole on Thursday night with a chance to reach the American League Championship Series. The Royals used four relievers before Kris Bubic took over for the eighth. The left-hander struck out Austin Wells before Stanton hit his 3-1 pitch nearly 420 feet to left to give New York the lead. The Royals tried to answer off Luke Weaver in the bottom half, getting Bobby Witt Jr.’s first hit of the series and a two-out single by franchise stalwart Salvador Perez. Weaver recovered to get Yuli Gurriel to fly out to end the threat, and he also handled the ninth to earn the save and cap 4 1/3 scoreless innings by the New York bullpen. The Yankees won despite another frustrating night in the postseason for MVP front-runner Aaron Judge. He went 0 for 4 with a walk, and is now 1 for 11 with only an infield single through three games against the Royals. It helped that the powerful Yankees drew nine walks Wednesday night, giving them 22 for the series. It was the first playoff game at the K in 3,268 days, since the Royals beat the Mets in Game 2 of the 2015 World Series. They won their...

title: The one time you don't need to worry about yellow leaves on your indoor plant
content: Y﻿ellow leaves are one of the biggest causes of concern for houseplant owners who fear it's a sign that something is wrong with their green baby. And often it is, from not enough water to too much water , too little or not enough light and root rot, there are many potential reasons an indoor plant might be showing signs of distress. However, expert and plant store owner Tanner Mitchell, who is known on social media as @tannertheplanter , has revealed we can stop worrying if the yellow leaves are in a specific spot. Watch the video above. ﻿READ MORE: Spring cleaning jobs to revamp your garden with In an Instagram reel featuring an anthurium hookerai with yellow leaves at the base near the soil, Mitchell explained why ﻿this isn't a problem. "﻿These yellow leaves you're seeing down here are actually a good thing," he said holding some of the plant's bottom leaves. ﻿"So what's happening right here is it's just old leaves that are dying off. So on this plant, the newest leaves come out from the very centre right here and then the oldest leaves are located nearest the bottom. This is going to be the same for pretty much every houseplant that you have: trees, trailing plants, upright plants like this, all of your oldest leaves are nearest the soil." title: Mexico passes inflation-matching minimum-wage reform
content: MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - Mexico's Senate unanimously passed a constitutional reform guaranteeing the country's minimum wage will be revised annually to at least match inflation. WHY IT'S IMPORTANT Around four in 10 Mexicans earn the minimum wage or less. The reform is meant to cement a floor for annual wage increases, although the previous administration of President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador backed some of the highest wage increases in decades. His successor, President Claudia Sheinbaum, has promised annual minimum wage increases of about 12%. CONTEXT The reform, which already passed in the lower house, had been proposed by Lopez Obrador before leaving office. Congress is currently working through a long list of constitutional reforms sent by Lopez Obrador, including a controversial judicial reform that passed last month. BY THE NUMBERS The minimum wage in Latin America's No. 2 economy currently stands at 248.93 pesos ($12.80) a day. Sheinbaum has said her government will work to gradually raise the minimum wage to cover the cost of 2.5 basic food baskets, or a standardized list of common grocery items for two people to live on per day, up from the current 1.6. KEY QUOTE: "Mexicans' wages will no longer fall victim to inflation," ruling party Senator Oscar Canton said. "We urgently need a Mexico where the minimum wage no longer sentences someone to a life of poverty." WHAT'S NEXT The reform will now be sent to state legislatures for vote. It is expected to pass in a...

title: NHC says Leslie could intensify into a major hurricane
content: (Reuters) - Leslie strengthened into a category 2 hurricane and may intensify into a major hurricane, the U.S. National Hurricane Center said late on Wednesday. "Leslie could briefly become a major hurricane tomorrow morning before rapid weakening begins," the forecast said. However, there are no coastal watches or warnings in effect, the latest NHC advisory added. The hurricane was located about 945 miles (1,515 km) east-northeast of the northern Leeward Islands, packing maximum sustained winds of 105 mph (165 kmh). (Reporting by Daksh Grover in Bengaluru; Editing by Jacqueline Wong)

title: Ratan Tata Passes Away: राजकीय सम्मान के साथ होगा रतन टाटा का अंतिम संस्कार, यहां पढ़ें देश के दिग्गज बिजनेसमैन के संघर्ष की कहानी
content: रतन टाटा नाम एक ऐसा नाम है, जिन्हें किसी परिचय की जरूरत नहीं है। दिग्गज उद्योगपति रतन टाटा का बुधवार रात निधन हो गया, जिसकी खबर ने हर किसी को उदास कर दिया है। उन्होंने 86 साल की उम्र में मुंबई के ब्रीच कैंडी अस्पताल में आखिरी सांस ली। रतन टाटा ने अपने जीवन में कई बड़ी उपलब्धियां हासिल की हैं और शायद उन्हें कम शब्दों में बयां करना मुमकिन नहीं है। वह न केवल एक सफल व्यवसायी थे, बल्कि एक महान नेता, और लाखों लोगों के लिए आशा के प्रतीक भी थे। उनका दिन इतना बड़ा था कि वह रात चलते लोगों के लिए भी चिंता करते थे। उन्हें जानवरों से लेकर हर उस इंसान की तकलीफ नजर आती थी, जिसे मदद की जरूरत है। ऐसे में इतने बड़े दिल वाले उद्योगपति का निधन होना, वाकई दिल को दुखाने वाला है। रतन टाटा का कहां हुआ था जन्म रतन टाटा का जन्म 28 दिसंबर 1937 को मुंबई में हुआ था। यहां पर ही उन्होंने अपने पढ़ाई भी पूरी की थी। उन्होंने 1962 में कॉर्नेल विश्वविद्यालय से वास्तुकला में स्नातक की डिग्री प्राप्त की। इसके बाद वह 1975 में हॉवर्ड बिजनेस स्कूल में एडवांस मैनेजमेंट प्रोग्राम की पढ़ाई करने गए। रतन टाटा के पिता नवल टाटा भी सफल उद्योगपति थे। उन्होंने टाटा समूह को अच्छे मुकाम तक पहुंचाया था, जिसके बाद जिम्मा रतन टाटा के पास आया। रतन टाटा की मां सोनी टाटा एक गृहिणी थीं। इसे भी पढ़ें- Ratan Tata Biodata: रतन टाटा ने अपनी पहली नौकरी के लिए ऐसे बनाया था रिज्यूमे, जानें ये दिलचस्प किस्सा कैसे हुई रतन टाटा के करियर की शुरुआत उन्होंने अपने करियर की शुरुआत साल 1961 में टाटा ग्रुप की मशहूर कंपनी टाटा स्टील से की थी। यहां से ही वह बिजनेस मैनेजमेंट की पढ़ाई के लिए हार्वर्ड बिजनेस स्कूल गए थे। इसके बाद वह टाटा टाटा समूह के...

Defensive-minded Broncos, Chargers square up for slugfest
creator: Field Level Media
content: Back in Denver days after breaking the long-running hex of the rival Raiders, the Broncos attempt to catch lightning in a bottle once more when another division foe rolls into town Sunday afternoon. The Broncos (3-2) catapulted into second place in the AFC West with a 34-18 win over the visiting Raiders last week and push for a fourth consecutive win over the Los Angeles Chargers (2-2). Los Angeles managed 16 total points in a pair of defeats against Denver last season, part of the reason the Chargers are under new management in 2024. New boss Jim Harbaugh steers a rested bunch into Week 6 following a bye week wary of a battle plan from the Broncos that looks eerily familiar. "Not where we want to be. We want to be 4-0," Harbaugh said. "We're 2-2." Denver enjoyed home cooking last week, when they snapped an eight-game losing streak to the Raiders that included every game since the franchise moved to Las Vegas. The Broncos put up 34 points, their highest output in a game since beating the Lions 38-10 on Dec. 12, 2021 with a backfield of Teddy Bridgewater and Melvin Gordon. Defense is the common denominator in this AFC West contest. The Broncos have allowed 11.8 points per game since a Week 1 loss at Seattle and are tied for second in the NFL in scoring defense behind the Chargers' NFL-leading 12.5 opponent points per game. "In my experience, defense comes along a little quicker," Harbaugh said. "Offense is that frustrated, patient discipline." Chargers quarterback Justin...

title: Knicks Need To Carve Out Role for Tyler Kolek
content: Tyler Kolek was one of the best guards in college basketball last season with Marquette. It helped him get drafted by the Portland Trailblazers and inevitably the New York Knicks. Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports Through two preseason contests, Kolek has looked the part of not just a quality rookie guard, but someone who can help the organization on the court immediately for when the regular season begins. Kolek recorded 15 points on 6-10 shooting from the field and went 2-2 from the free throw line to help the Knicks defeat the Washington Wizards 117-94 Wednesday night. Add in an additional five assists, two rebounds, and two steals and Kolek's all-around game continues to shine when given the opportunity to show his skill set during the preseason. It also shows New York should try to find time for Kolek to see the field over the course of the 2024 season. To get on the court, though, Miles McBride, Josh Hart, Cameron Payne, and Landry Shamet are veterans Kolek needs to beat out overall. The Marquette star has looked solid through the first two games of the preseason. Related: Knicks Look to Cease Wizards' Magic And when it comes to the organization, the best players should play no matter what. So far, Kolek looks like a player worthy of that time.

title: DACA está otra vez en riesgo: nuevos argumentos en Corte de Apelaciones
content: Este 10 de octubre, el Tribunal de Apelaciones del Quinto Circuito en Nueva Orleans escuchará los argumentos orales sobre la demanda para poner fin el programa de los Llegados en la Infancia (DACA). El gobierno republicano de Texas presentó la demanda original contra el proceso administrativo para otorgar DACA a los ‘dreamers’, un desafío similar que ha ocurrido en varias ocasiones. El caso vuelve a un tribunal de apelaciones y es respaldado por otros gobiernos republicanos: Alabama, Arkansas, Louisiana, Nebraska, Carolina del Sur, West Virginia, Kansas y Mississippi. “Todos debemos tener claro quién y qué está en juego en el caso de DACA. Va más allá de las políticas y leyes de inmigración y va directo a la cuestión de a qué tipo de país aspiramos. Cientos de miles de Dreamers han confiado en DACA para convertirse, literalmente, en la encarnación del sueño americano”, consideró Vanessa Cárdenas, directora ejecutiva de America’s Voice. “El esfuerzo incesante del Partido Republicano por poner fin al popular y exitoso programa DACA mientras bloquea la legislación que ofrecería a los Dreamers una forma de convertirse en ciudadanos estadounidenses de pleno derecho dice mucho sobre el Partido Republicano de 2024”. Fwd.us, una organización civil que trabaja con Dreamers, señala que el beneficiario promedio de DACA llegó a EE.UU. a la edad de 6 años. “DACA ha permitido a las personas construir carreras y vidas”, indica. La organización agrega que el fin de...

title: Michigan's Jack Tuttle Makes Stark Admission On Injuries Leading Up To First Game At Washington
content: Michigan football lost for the second time of the season on the road against Washington last Saturday in a game that saw a changing of the guard at quarterback for Coach Sherrone Moore and Offensive Coordinator Kirk Campbell's offense. Incumbent starter Alex Orji was pulled early in the second quarter for seventh-year graduate student Jack Tuttle with the Wolverines trailing 14-0. Tuttle led Michigan to a 17-14 lead before costly turnovers committed by the former Indiana quarterback helped to spark Washington's 27-17 home victory. On Tuesday, Tuttle made a surprising admission on his status leading up to the Washington game last week, as shared by Wolverines reporter Alejandro Zúñiga on X. "The week of Washington was the real first time I practiced for a while, a long while," Tuttle said, adding that he didn't even participate in scout team action. "Just trying to get back and get right," Tuttle said about his current goals, adding that he is focusing on getting "a lot more reps" with his teammates during Michigan's bye week. Tuttle completed 10-of-18 passes for 98 yards, a touchdown and an interception on Saturday vs. the Huskies. An attempted pass to Colston Loveland on third down in the fourth quarter resulted in an incomplete pass as a Washington defender was draped all over Loveland, causing an incensed Tuttle to motion for a pass interference flag that was not given. Tuttle also threw an interception on an out route to Loveland and was stripped of the football while...

How Long Will Val Stick Around? ‘Chicago P.D.’s LaRoyce Hawkins on Atwater’s New Love Interest
creator: Meredith Jacobs, TV Insider
content: [Warning: The below contains MAJOR spoilers for Chicago P.D. Season 12 Episode 3 “Off Switch.”] What Officer Kevin Atwater ( LaRoyce Hawkins ) needs is an off switch, and it seems like he may have found one by the end of the latest Chicago P.D. episode in the form of some fun with forensic psychologist Val Soto (Natalee Linez). At first, Val is just a woman that Atwater meets and connects with at a cop bar while juggling messages from his family and tenants. They hit it off then, but they clash over how much to push a victim when it turns out she’s the forensic psychologist working with Intelligence on an armed robbery case. At the end of the episode, he goes to her house and apologizes, and she brings up his long list of to dos and how that “burns people out.” Atwater is “very aware,” he says, and it isn’t the first time he’s heard that. “Do you have an off switch?” Val asks. That’s something he hasn’t figured out, he admits, and she kisses him. “I have a proposition,” she offers, “How about for the next hour you come inside, turn off your brain, turn off your damn phone, and have fun with me? I won’t judge you, you won’t judge me, and we’ll do something just for us, to turn it all off.” He agrees. Elizabeth Sisson/NBC But is this going to be a long-term relationship for Atwater? Does he have time for something serious right now? That’s exactly what TV Insider asked Hawkins. “I’m not sure,” Hawkins said. “I think Atwater’s in a pocket where he’s just letting go, letting go...

title: El TC anula parte de la ley antidesahucios catalana por invasión de competencias
creator: Carlota Garrido Ortiz
content: Carlota Guindal El Tribunal Constitucional ha estimado parcialmente el recurso de inconstitucionalidad, promovido por el PP, contra el conjunto de la ley del Parlamento de Catalunya para afrontar la emergencia en el ámbito de la vivienda. La sentencia, de la que ha sido ponente la magistrada María Luisa Segoviano, concluye que parte de los preceptos impugnados incurren en una efectiva invasión de las competencias estatales en materia de legislación procesal y sobre bases de las obligaciones contractuales. La ley tiene su origen en la iniciativa legislativa popular de vivienda del 2014, aprobada en el Parlament en el 2015 (ley 24/2015), para luchar contra la emergencia habitacional y proteger el acceso a la vivienda de las personas en situación vulnerable. Esta fue tumbada previamente, y se recuperó y amplió con la ley 1/2022, que es la que ahora ha sido anulada parcialmente. El Govern asegura que se han firmado 3.000 alquileres sociales entre grandes tenedores y familias Algunos de los puntos anulados configuran la parte central de la ley. Entre ellos, el que obliga a los grandes propietarios (bancos o fondos principalmente) a ofrecer un alquiler social antes de ejecutar un desahucio o a prorrogar de forma forzosa el alquiler social durante siete años. En concreto, la declaración de inconstitucionalidad afecta al derecho a la vivienda, que establece como causa de incumplimiento de la función social de la propiedad de una vivienda o un edificio de viviendas la...

title: Sinopsis Film Horor Sosok Ketiga, Populer di Netflix, Teror Mistis Mengerikan terhadap Istri Kedua
content: - Inilah sinopsis film horor Indonesia berjudul , yang saat ini sedang populer di Netflix. Film merupakan garapan sutradara Dedy Mercy, yang rilis 2023 dengan durasi 1 jam 39 menit. Dilansir dari IMDb, film mengusung genre drama, horor, dan thriller. Film ini dibintangi oleh , , dan . Film mengusung tagline 'Terkadang Manusia Lebih Menakutkan daripada Setan' Kisah ini menceritakan tentang sosok Anton, yang memilih berpoligami dengan Yuni, sahabat istrinya, Nuri. Bukannya bahagia, konflik dan teror mengerikan justru menanti kehidupan rumah tangga Anton dan Yuni. Anton menikahi Yuni karena merasa jatuh cinta padanya. Padahal, Yuni dan Nuri bersahabat, dan mereka berjanji tidak akan mengejar lelaki yang sama. Meski diliputi rasa kecewa, Nuri akhirnya memutuskan menerima Yuni menjadi madunya. Hal ini lantaran Nuri sudah beberapa kali keguguran, dan merasa tak kunjung bisa memberikan keturunan kepada Anton. Kekecewaan Nuri semakin mendalam lantaran Anton tak mampu menepati janjinya untuk adil. Yuni kemudian mengalami teror supranatural saat hamil, yang membuatnya sakit-sakitan, dan berujung konflik dengan Bude.

title: Journée mondiale de la santé mentale : aux thermes de Saujon, des cures pour soigner le burn-out et la dépression
content: Burn-out, dépression chronique, anxiété.... En France, de plus en plus de personnes en souffrent. On considère qu'une personne sur dix a vécu un épisode dépressif au cours des douze derniers mois. Et qu'une personne sur trois connaîtra un épisode de maladie mentale au cours de sa vie. Pour les prendre en charge, il y a des médicaments, des psychothérapies et une troisième voie : la cure thermale. À Saujon, dans le sud de la Charente-Maritime, il y a justement un établissement de pointe. Depuis plus d'un siècle et demi, ils prennent soin de patients en détresse mentale avec des bains et des massages. "Ce n'est pas une thalasso !" "La cure thermale c'est quelque chose de médical, on n'est pas en thalasso !" La responsable de l'établissement, Christine Favre met les points sur les i. Elle salue chacun des curistes qu'elle croise dans les couloirs des thermes. "Ils sont atteints d'anxiété, de dépression, de fatigue chronique, de handicap, ou encore douleurs psychosomatiques . Tous les matins pendant trois semaines, ils bénéficient de quatre types de soins" explique-t-elle en se faufilant parmi les patients en claquettes et peignoirs blancs. Les cabines de douches multi-jets, de baignoires à bulles, de massages se succèdent. Des hydrothérapeutes, comme Mouna, y installent les baigneurs : "Il y a des jets, des bulles, des pommeaux que l'on peut diriger vers sur son plexus, les gens adorent !" Parmi les 300 curistes présents en ce moment aux thermes de...

title: La santé mentale pourrait encore être mieux prise en charge dans l'Yonne selon l'UNAFAM
content: 13 millions de personnes en France vivent avec un trouble psychique Prendre soin de sa santé mentale est important, d'autant que personne n'est à l'abri : un accident de vie, une maladie, la perte d'autonomie peuvent nous fragiliser, pourtant il existe encore un tabou autour de ce sujet. A l'occasion de la journée mondiale de la santé mentale ce jeudi 10 octobre santé, l'Alliance pour la santé mentale publie une enquête qui révèle qu'un tiers seulement des Français ne parleraient pas de troubles s'ils en avaient. Selon Cécile Barbosa, directrice de la clinique Ker-Yonnec à Champigny sur Yonne dans le nord du département, il est primordial de libérer la parole et de se faire aider le plus tôt possible; "Accepter de demander de l'aide n'est pas un cap facile, malgré tout, les études montrent qu'une grande partie de la population va avoir besoin à un moment de sa vie de consulter pour surmonter un épisode douloureux qui met en cause sa santé mentale. Et pourtant il existe encore une difficulté à recourir aux soins observe la directrice de la clinique Ker-Yonnec. Il est important de se faire prendre en charge précocement pour éviter un traitement plus lourd par la suite. Le patient comme son entourage ne doivent pas négliger des signes comme un changement brusque de comportement par exemple ou un repli sur soi. Dans l'Yonne, le manque de médecins et de médecins psychiatres en particulier est un frein à la bonne prise en charge des malades estime...

title: Police investigate theft arrests
creator: By Press Staff
content: Authorities dealt with a spectacle of sorts after a Memphis woman was arrested on suspicion of stealing over $5,000 worth of eyeglass frames from a Walmart store earlier this year. Camille L. Martin, 40, of Memphis was arrested Oct. 7 on suspicion of theft of property and breaking or entering after an investigation by Paragould police. Authorities said in a probable cause affidavit that officers went to Walmart in the 2800 block of West Kingshighway Sept. 3 about the case. Police believe Martin and another person went to the store. “The defendants entered into the Vision Center and tried on multiple pairs of glasses. The defendants were captured on surveillance footage concealing multiple eye glass frames,” Paragould police said. “The defendants then exited the store with over $5,000 worth of eye glass frames, without making a purchase.” Police later found out Martin and the other person, whose name was not released, were wanted in connection to similar cases in multiple jurisdictions in Arkansas and Tennessee. Martin was being held Tuesday in the Greene County jail, without bond, awaiting an arraignment date in the case. A $150,000 bond was set earlier this month for a Mississippi County man arrested on suspicion of theft, criminal mischief and nonfinancial identity fraud after reportedly using a family member’s ID for nearly a day before authorities found out who he was. Josh E. Harrington, 41, of Blytheville was arrested on suspicion of two counts of theft of property,...

title: Otro Nou d'Octubre con el autogobierno valenciano bajo la amenaza de retroceso
creator: Salvador Enguix Oliver
content: Salvador Enguix València Carlos Mazón reivindicó ayer el autogobierno valenciano en su discurso institucional del Nou d'Octubre. Pero desde la reforma del Estatut del año 2006, pactada entre el PP de Francisco Camps y el PSPV de Joan Ignasi Pla, que se hizo para “profundizar en el autogobierno valenciano”, la Generalitat ha ido perdiendo, paulatinamente, capacidad de maniobra política e, incluso, el Constitucional decidió, por recurso del Gobierno de José Luís Rodríguez Zapatero, eliminar el Derecho Civil Valenciano que se incorporaba con esa reforma. Carlos Mazón reivindica el autogobierno y la “nacionalidad histórica” valenciana El president valenciano apuntaba con su exigencia, sin citarlo, a un asunto que lleva criticando desde hace días: que desde el Gobierno se intente condicionar un Fondo de Nivelación Transitorio (hasta que se apruebe un nuevo modelo de financiación) a que no se hagan rebajas de impuestos “a los ricos”, según denuncia la ministra y líder del PSPV, Diana Morant. Los socialistas valencianos rechazan exigir ese fondo de nivelación. Mazón le trasladó esa crítica a Pedro Sánchez el pasado viernes en el Palacio de la Moncloa; es su petición de que se respete la autonomía fiscal. La reforma del sistema de financiación de 2009 ha perjudicado a los valencianos Volvamos a la reforma de 2006. En esas fechas, la Generalitat Valenciana, presidida por Francisco Camps, podía recurrir a deuda privada para financiar sus políticas. En el año...

title: A pundit describes achieving only one Western Conference Finals appearance during the Kawhi Leonard-Paul George era as a significant disappointment
content: In the summer of 2019, the Los Angeles Clippers shocked the NBA world by signing two of the most feared two-way players: two-time Defensive Player of the Year Kawhi Leonard and perennial All-Star Paul George. When news of the partnership broke, the Clippers were almost immediately installed as the favorites to win it all. Five years have passed since that franchise milestone, and history shows that the Clippers never won anything during that stretch. And save for a run toward the Western Conference Finals in 2021, those Kawhi Leonard-Paul George years have been an utter disappointment. Injury-riddled campaigns On paper, Kawhi and PG had everything they needed to win at least one title. They had one of the best coaches in Ty Lue, and a capable supporting cast that included Ivica Zubac, Reggie Jackson, Marcus Morris, and Lou Williams. However, it was not meant to be, as Kawhi got injured in the playoffs, and the Clippers eventually faltered against the Phoenix Suns. "To have only gotten to one Western Conference Final appearance out of the Kawhi Leonard and Paul George duo's five-year run is an utter disappointment," Mo Dakhil of Bleacher Report wrote . From bad to worse It was all downhill from there, as not even adding a third legitimate superstar, James Harden, to their fold last season could change the team's fortunes. Kawhi again got hobbled by a knee injury, and the Dallas Mavericks handed LA's other squad the door in the first round. "The tandem of Leonard and George...

title: Ratan Tata Quotes: Words By The Business Tycoon That Will Continue To Inspire Generations
content: Ratan Tata, a successful and renowned businessman, passed away on Wednesday at 86. The Chairman of Tata Sons took his last breath at Mumbai's Breach Candy Hospital. People from all aspects of life poured their condolences on the death of Ratan Tata Prime Minister Narendra Modi too expressed grief at the demise of the iconic industrialist and said that he was a visionary business leader. Ratan Tata inspired and will continue to inspire upcoming generations through his journey. He also inspired the young generations through his quotes and sayings. Let's take a look at motivational quotes by one of the greatest tycoons of all time(Ratan Tata quotes). - "None can destroy iron, but its own rust can! Likewise, none can destroy a person, but their own mindset can." - "I don't believe in taking right decisions. I take decisions and then make them right." - "Ups and downs in life are very important to keep us going because a straight line even in an ECG means we are not alive." ALSO READ: Ratan Tata Successor: Who Will Inherit Fortune Worth Rs 3,800 Crore After Business Legend's Death - "Leadership is not about being in charge. It is about taking care of those in your charge." - "Never forget your roots, and always be proud of where you come from." - "The greatest failure is not to try." - "I don't believe in work-life balance. I believe in work-life integration. Make your work and life meaningful and fulfilling, and they will complement each other." - "The biggest risk is not taking...

title: PM Modi Departs For Laos To Attend ASEAN-India, East Asia Summits
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday morning has departed for a two-day visit to Laos to attend the 21st ASEAN-India Summit and the 19th East Asia Summit. PM Modi's visit to Vientiane for a two-day visit comes at the invitation of his Laos counterpart Sonexay Siphandone. Ministry of External Affairs Secretary (East), Jaideep Mazumdar, emphasised that India places immense value on all ASEAN-related mechanisms and asserted that the meeting will chart the future course of the India-ASEAN relationship. ALSO READ: Mumbai Braces For Continued Rain And Thunderstorms, IMD Issues Yellow Alert | Check Forecast While addressing a special briefing on PM Modi's visit to Laos on Wednesday, Mazumdar said, "Prime Minister Modi will be travelling to Vientiane in Lao PDR, for the 21st ASEAN-India Summit and the 19th East Asia Summit at the invitation of Prime Minister of Lao PDR, Sonexay Siphandone. The visit will be over 10th and 11th October. We attach great significance to all ASEAN-related mechanisms. This will be the Prime Minister's tenth attendance at the ASEAN-India Summit." Highlighting the significance of the meeting, Mazumdar added, "The significance of this particular summit will be that it is the tenth anniversary of the Prime Minister's Act East policy. The PM, along with other heads of state in the governments of ASEAN countries will review the relations progress between India and ASEAN and he will chart the future direction of our relationship." The MEA official further...

title: Sekjen HKTI Harap Presiden Terpilih Beri Perhatian Lebih ke Nasib Petani Tembakau
Cowboys Trade Pitch Secures $22 Million Star WR Alongside CeeDee Lamb
content: The Dallas Cowboys just lost Brandin Cooks for at least the next four weeks and could use a No. 2 wide receiver alongside CeeDee Lamb . It is clear that quarterback Dak Prescott and the passing game will have to carry the Cowboys offense, if not the entire team, for most of the remainder of the season after a tumultuous 3-2 start. Dallas has struggled mightily to both run the football and stop the run over the first five weeks, and Prescott and Lamb cashed in to the tune of a combined $376 million on new contract extensions over the offseason. That said, Prescott and Lamb can't do it all on their own. Kristopher Knox of Bleacher Report on Wednesday, October 9, authored a trade pitch that would see Dallas make a deal for Cincinnati Bengals wideout Tee Higgins ahead of the NFL's November 5 trade deadline. © Charles LeClaire-USA TODAY Sports "Higgins is a high-end No. 2 receiver who should draw a fair return, even in a market that could be flooded with receiver talent," Knox wrote . "Dallas may have salvaged its season with a much-needed win over the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday night, and it could use a strong complement to CeeDee Lamb on the perimeter. Brandin Cooks was recently placed on injured reserve following a knee procedure." Higgins requested a trade out of Cincinnati during the offseason when he and the Bengals were unable to come to terms on a contract extension. Cincinnati responded by using the franchise tag to keep Higgins on the roster through 2024 on a $22...

title: Matan a balazos a pareja de ancianitos en su casa
creator: Noticias de hoy en Honduras: Sucesos, deportes y más
content: Una pareja de esposos perdió la vida luego de que fuera atacada a balazos por individuos la noche del martes cuando ingresaron a su vivienda en la aldea Colmena en el municipio de San Antonio, Cortés, al norte de Honduras Se trata de Miguel Ángel Carabantes (de 75 años) y Élida Cruz Lemus (de 76), cuyos cuerpos fueron retirados este día por sus familiares de la morgue sampedrana. Lelis Carabantes, hijo de la pareja, dijo consternado que el hecho se produjo a eso de las 8:00 pm del martes; sin embargo sus padres fueron encontrados aún con vida por una persona hasta la mañana de hoy. Mal heridos, fueron trasladados al hospital Mario Rivas, pero doña Élida murió en la ambulancia camino al centro asistencial, mientras que su esposo minutos después de ingresar a la sala de emergencia. “Es un dolor grande el que vivimos como familia. Ellos fueron padres que siempre estuvieron pendientes de nosotros y es triste porque no sabemos por qué los mataron y por qué lo hicieron de esa forma”, dijo Lelis al tiempo de contar que sus padres siempre se dedicaron a la agricultura y ganaderia. El acongojado hombre indicó que no saben el móvil del crimen y que desconocen si sus progenitores tenía enemigos, pero dijo que en el sector hay muchas personas que se dedican a robar por lo que no descartan que hayan sido víctimas de malvivientes que intentaron atracar la casa y al no encontrarles nada de valor, los terminaron matando. “Solo espero que las autoridades investiguen, pero...

title: Capaian Kinerja Gemilang, Jasa Raharja Terima Penghargaan dari The Asian Post
Lawrence Confident in Giants Pass Rush After Despite Thibodeaux Injury
content: The New York Giants are built on a pass rush that’s supposed to be elite. It’s no surprise they’ve logged 15 sacks across their two victories on the young season. Between defensive tackle Dexter Lawrence and edge rusher Brian Burns, there’s no shortage of star power up front. Edge rushers Kayvon Thibodeaux has provided some firepower, too. But Thibodeaux suffered a wrist injury against the Seattle Seahawks, fracturing a bone and being pronounced week-to-week. © Scott Galvin-Imagn Images Thibodeaux may not have elevated himself to a true star just yet, but his injury poses a threat to New York’s pass rush, especially if rotational edge rusher Azeez Ojulari doesn’t step up adequately. The leader of the unit, Lawrence, made sure to express his confidence in Ojulari on Wednesday. ​​"I have a lot of confidence in Azeez," Lawrence said, via the team’s website . "He's been in the league for four years now. He's made a lot of plays in this league and for this team. I sent him a text message and told him it's his time. And this is your opportunity to go take over." Ojulari posted eight sacks as a rookie but battled injuries and inconsistencies over the two years since, logging just eight sacks in that span. He emerged as a viable starter but has seen lost playing time, being relegated to a passing-down threat on a rotational basis. So far this season, Ojulari has a single sack, a fumble recovery, and a tackle for loss. Thibodeaux, meanwhile, has logged two sacks starting opposite...

title: ਪੰਜਾਬ ਵਿਚ 15 ਅਤੇ 17 ਅਕਤੂੂਬਰ ਦੀ ਛੁੱਟੀ ਦਾ ਐਲਾਨ, ਵੇਖੋ ਨੋਟੀਫਿਕੇਸ਼ਨ
content: **Holiday announced in punjab-**ਪੰਚਾਇਤੀ ਚੋਣਾਂ ਕਾਰਨ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਵਿਚ ਛੁੱਟੀ ਦਾ ਐਲਾਨ ਕੀਤਾ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ। ਚੋਣਾਂ ਕਾਰਨ 15 ਅਕਤੂਬਰ ਨੂੰ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਵਿਚ ਗਜ਼ਟਿਡ ਛੁੱਟੀ ਦਾ ਐਲਾਨ ਕੀਤਾ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ। ਸਾਰੇ ਸਰਕਾਰੀ ਦਫ਼ਤਰ/ਬੋਰਡ/ ਕਾਰਪੋਰੇਸ਼ਨਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਵਿਦਿਅਕ ਅਦਾਰੇ ਬੰਦ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ। ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਇਲਾਵਾ ਚੰਡੀਗੜ੍ਹ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਰਕਾਰੀ (Holiday announced in punjab) ਦਫ਼ਤਰ, ਬੋਰਡ, ਕਾਰਪੋਰੇਸ਼ਨ ਬੰਦ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ। ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਇਲਾਵਾ ਸੂਬਾ ਸਰਕਾਰ ਨੇ ਮਹਾਰਿਸ਼ੀ ਵਾਲਮੀਕਿ ਜੈਅੰਤੀ ਮੌਕੇ 17 ਅਕਤੂਬਰ ਨੂੰ ਛੁੱਟੀ ਦਾ ਐਲਾਨ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ। ਇਸ ਮੌਕੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਸਕੂਲ, ਦਫਤਰ ਬੰਦ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ।

title: Knicks Get First Look At Jalen Brunson-Karl-Anthony Towns Dominance
content: Much of the New York Knicks' hopes for the 2024 season hinge on the success of their two top stars. At one point, those stars were thought to be Jalen Brunson and Mikal Bridges. Since the trade of Karl-Anthony Towns, though the reality is that New York's playoff hopes will hinge now on how far Brunson and Towns work together. © Vincent Carchietta-Imagn Images And how the two work on the court. Through the first two preseason games, it looks like the relationship is growing pretty well. Brunson and Towns combined for 48 points in the team's 117-94 victory over the Washington Wizards Wednesday night. Towns added 12 rebounds while Brunson recorded three assists and three rebounds on the day as well. Brunson enjoyed a pretty efficient day shooting 7-10 from the field. Towns, on the other hand struggled from the field. At one point, Towns was just 1-7 from the field. He ended 7-20 from the field and 1-7 from beyond the arc. Related: Knicks Look to Cease Wizards' Magic The relationship between Brunson and Towns is incredibly important moving forward. It's important to note that the team won't see both play well at the same time. Through two preseason games, though, the Knicks should be thrilled with their current guard and center duo.

IAS समेत कई अफसरों के आयुष्मान कार्ड:केंद्रीय स्वास्थ्य मंत्रालय की डिप्टी सेक्रेटरी के आवेदन पर विवाद; रूही खान बोलीं- पूरा परिवार भोपाल गैस पीड़ित
content: मध्यप्रदेश में आयुष्मान भारत निरामयम योजना का फायदा बड़े-बड़े अफसर यहां तक कि आईएएस भी उठा रहे हैं। योजना महंगा इलाज कराने में असमर्थ परिवार के मरीजों को 5 लाख रुपए तक का मुफ्त इलाज देने के लिए शुरू की गई थी। योजना में भोपाल गैस पीड़ितों को सशर्त पात ये मामला भी एक आईएएस अफसर के आवेदन से उजागर हुआ है। इसके बाद आयुष्मान कार्ड बनाने को लेकर विवाद इतना बढ़ गया कि दो महीने तक लोगों के आयुष्मान कार्ड बनाने का काम ही रुका रहा। मामला दिल्ली में केंद्रीय स्वास्थ्य मंत्रालय की नेशनल हेल्थ अथॉरिटी में डिप्टी सेक्रेटरी आईएएस रूही खान से जुड़ा है। हालांकि उन्होंने कहा- मेरा पूरा परिवार भोपाल गैस पीड़ित है। गैस पीड़ित होने के आधार पर उन्होंने आयुष्मान कार्ड के लिए आवेदन किया, तो मप्र आयुष्मान की तत्कालीन सीईओ अदिति गर्ग ने पात्रता पर सवाल खड़े कर दिए। उन्होंने कार्ड बनाने की प्रक्रिया को ही होल्ड करवा दिया। इस फैसले से अब तक बने ऐसे आयुष्मान कार्ड की भी जांच की गई है। मामले में अब प्रमुख सचिव लोक स्वास्थ्य एवं चिकित्सा शिक्षा, गैस राहत विभाग को आखिरी फैसला लेना है। रूही खान बोलीं- जब हादसा हुआ तब तो मैं आईएएस नहीं थी इधर, आईएएस रूही खान का कहना है कि जब 1984 में भोपाल गैस त्रासदी हुई थी, तब वे आईएएस अफसर नहीं थीं। उनका तर्क है कि वो और उनका पूरा परिवार गैस पीड़ित है। इस कारण उनका आयुष्मान कार्ड बनना चाहिए। वहीं, आयुष्मान विंग और गैस राहत विभाग के बीच उनके दावे को लेकर असहमति है। गैस राहत विभाग ने स्पष्ट किया है कि कोर्ट के आदेश के अनुसार सभी गैस पीड़ितों के आयुष्मान कार्ड बनाए जा सकते हैं। यह न्यायालय की ओर से स्वीकृत प्रक्रिया है, जिसे किसी एक व्यक्ति के लिए रोका नहीं जाना चाहिए। इन...

WATCH LIVE: Deputy PM addresses bullying allegations in Question Time
content: Question Time has begun with topics expected to include fallout from bullying allegations surrounding the office of Deputy Prime Minister Richard Marles. Join SkyNews.com.au at 2pm to watch Question Time live from Canberra. Deputy Opposition Leader Sussan Ley immediately put the question to Mr Marles about allegations levelled by his chief of staff, Jo Tarnawsky, who said she was pushed out of her role. Mr Marles claimed he was satisfied he has upheld the highest workplace standards including maintaining a safe and respectful workplace for his staff. “I feel very sad that events have got to where they have. It is obviously very difficult,” Mr Marles said. “Let me say that in the way in which I have tried to manage this, I have done so with Jo 's welfare in mind at every moment. “It is difficult for me to say anything more on this issue.” The Deputy Prime Minister has contested Ms Tarnawsky's assertions and said he was committed to improving workplace culture in Canberra. Other likely parliamentary topics up for debate during Question Time include the government’s international student cap bill, social media laws and merger reforms. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese will not attend Parliament House as he visits Laos for the ASEAN Summit. Join SkyNews.com.au to watch live from 2pm AEDT.

title: Football legend wins $300k A-League stoush
content: Macarthur FC will pay its former coach Dwight Yorke almost $300,000 in compensation to avoid being banned by FIFA from signing players until the middle of 2026. Former Manchester United star Yorke was sacked by the Bulls in January 2023 after allegedly describing Macarthur as a “pub team” and “hopeless from top to bottom” in a fiery spray following a 1-0 A-League loss to Adelaide United. Despite thanking club officials and owners at the time, Yorke claimed he was unfairly axed and eventually took his case to FIFA’s tribunal and the Court of Arbitration for Sport. Last month, CAS upheld a FIFA ruling that Macarthur breached Yorke’s contract by sacking him “without just cause”. FIFA has since announced that the Bulls will be banned in taking part in the next three international transfer windows unless Yorke is paid $290,000, plus interest, in damages. Macarthur chief executive Sam Krslovic said on Thursday the Bulls would resolve the matter by paying Yorke the money, “pending legal advice”, in the upcoming weeks to allow them to be involved in the next transfer window, which starts in January. “(But) the club is disappointed in the way this has all played out and is disappointed that FIFA doesn’t see anything incorrect about negative cultural behaviour,” Krslovic said. “We are now in a culturally better place as a club. “This won’t affect us. We’ve catered for it and budgeted for it. We’re in a positive position.” The Bulls were last season rocked by a betting scandal that...

title: Suryakumar Yadav Makes Shocking Statement After India Suffers Top-Order Batting Collapse In 2nd T20I, Says, 'I Wanted That Situation'
content: IND vs BAN, 2nd T20I: The Men in Blue were in a state of bother as they were 41/3 after openers Sanju Samson, Abhishek Sharma, and skipper Suryakumar Yadav fell cheaply but the Indian captain made a shocking revelation and admitted that he wanted this situation where his middle-order batters like Rinku Singh, Nitish Kumar Reddy, and Hardik Pandya perform brilliantly under pressure situations. After suffering a batting collapse the team bounced back quickly and posted a mammoth target of 221/9 won the match by 86 runs and are leading the three-match T20I series by 2-0. Rinku Singh (53) and Nitish Reddy (73) played aggressive cricket and went all-guns-blazing against the Bangladesh bowlers and helped the team bounce back. Hardik Pandya (32) and Riyan Parag (15) too scored quickfire knocks and they smashed 14 sixes thus putting the team in a commanding position. During the post-match presentation, Suryakumar Yadav heaped praises for performing well under pressure situation. "I wanted that situation. I wanted my middle-order (5, 6, 7) to bat under pressure and express themselves. I'm really happy with the way Rinku and Nitish played. They batted exactly as I wanted," he said. The Indian bowlers performed equally well. Suryakumar Yadav made a bold move as he used seven different bowlers during the second innings and it was the first time in the history of the shortest format that all the bowlers took one wicket at least. It should be noted here that Hardik Pandya didn't bowl a...

title: Golden State Warriors Still Coming To Terms With Not Having Klay Thompson To Start The 24-25 Season
content: Klay Thompson signed a three-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks this offseason, ending a 13-year stint with the Golden State Warriors . He won four titles with the Warriors alongside career-long teammates Stephen Curry and Draymond Green, who revealed to ESPN that they're still reeling from the loss of their teammate this summer , Curry opened up on how different the practice facility feels without Klay there, frankly admitting that he never thought their union as a trio would ever end. "[Klay] would usually enter the practice facility coming off of his boat. With his Dockers on, whatever outfit he had on. He just had a presence about him, a lightness when he came into the room. And his one-liners were always great. ... [I'm] talking about him like he died, [which is] super weird. "Life throws a lot of curve balls in sports. You're used to seeing people change places and teams. [However] up until but a week before he decided to sign Dallas, we never really thought it was going to end." Klay had a five-minute phone conversation with Draymond Green a week before free agency, a shocking development for Green as Thompson never once tried making small-talk with his teammates in the 12 years before that. Green knew at that moment that Klay had decided to leave the Warriors, with the shooting guard revealing later in the call that Texas was going to be his new home. Even though everyone's been aware of Klay's move, it didn't sink in for Green until he came for media day and...

Canadiens out last Maple Leafs
content: Caufield scored at 7:48 of the opening period, finishing off a tic-tac-toe play with Juraj Slafkovsky and Kirby Dach. The Canadiens were 1 for 5 on the power play after going 0 for 30 in the preseason. Anthony Stolarz made 26 saves for Toronto after expected starter Joseph Woll was held out of the lineup. Coach Craig Berube said Woll had “lower-body tightness.” RANGERS 6, PENGUINS 0 PITTSBURGH (AP) — Igor Shesterkin stopped 29 shots and New York opened the season with a victory over Pittsburgh. Chris Kreider scored twice for the reigning Metropolitan Division champions. Sam Carrick, Alexis Lafreniere, Filip Chytil and Vincent Trocheck also scored for New York, which dominated Pittsburgh while beating the Penguins for the fifth time in their last six meetings. Chytil’s goal was his first in over 18 months after he missed most of last season due to a concussion. The center’s flick to the far post against Tristan Jarry just before the game’s midway point boosted New York’s lead to 4-0. Jarry stopped 35 of the 41 shots he faced for Pittsburgh. Penguins star Sidney Crosby was held scoreless in his 20th season opener. Evgeni Malkin was held without a point. The Russian star began his 19th season with 498 career goals and 798 career assists.

title: China's solar goes from supremacy to oversupply
creator: Oliver HOTHAM
content: Strong state support and huge private investment have made China's solar industry a global powerhouse, but it faces new headwinds, from punitive tariffs abroad to a brutal price war at home. Officials meeting in Baku next month for the COP29 summit hope to agree on new finance targets to help developing countries respond to climate change, including ditching fossil fuels. Last year, countries agreed to triple global installed renewable energy capacity by 2030. China is installing almost twice as much solar and wind power as every other country combined. And it dominates the market. It makes eight out of every 10 solar panels and controls 80 percent of every stage of the manufacturing process. It is also home to the world's top 10 suppliers of solar panel manufacturing equipment, and its related exports hit a record $49 billion last year, according to Wood Mackenzie. That supremacy is not accidental: Chinese state support has been key, analysts say. Beijing invested over $50 billion in new solar supply capacity from 2011 to 2022, according to the International Energy Agency. The industry has also benefited from access to cheap raw materials, readily available capital from state-owned banks, and huge engineering manpower. "Chinese producers were ahead of everyone else on cost," said Lauri Myllyvirta, co-founder of the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air, a climate think tank. "That meant new investment takes place in China, because that's where it's most competitive,"...

title: Asian markets track Wall St record as Hong Kong, Shanghai stabilise
creator: AFP
content: Asian markets tracked a record day on Wall Street Thursday, with Shanghai and Hong Kong supported by a Chinese central bank move to boost liquidity for major stock-buyers. The yen sat around two-month lows after taking a hit in the wake of minutes showing Federal Reserve decision-makers were split on last month's bumper interest rate cut while a top official sparked questions about how many more could be in the pipeline. Chinese investors were settling down after a volatile start to the week that saw mainland and Hong Kong markets whipsaw as the euphoria over last month's stimulus was dampened by a news conference that failed to unveil more measures or give details on those already announced. Traders welcomed news that the People's Bank of China had released details of a "swap facility" that will allow "qualified securities, funds and insurance companies" to access more than $70 billion in liquidity to purchase equities. The move, one of a number of measures announced last month, helped Shanghai rise more than one percent at one point, having dived more than six percent Wednesday -- its worst day in more than four years. Hong Kong was up more than two percent, building on the previous day's advance that followed a more than nine percent plunge, its heftiest in 16 years. Dealers are now keenly awaiting a Saturday news conference on fiscal policy by the finance ministry, though observers warned the bar would be high for Finance Minister Lan Fo'an if he is to get the recent...

title: Mumbai Braces For Continued Rain And Thunderstorms, IMD Issues Yellow Alert | Check Forecast
content: Mumbai Weather: After enduring several days of intense heat, Mumbai and its neighbouring areas have experienced a welcome spell of rain, bringing relief to residents. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has predicted that the wet conditions will likely persist over the next three to four days. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) issued a yellow alert on Wednesday, signalling moderate rainfall in Mumbai as showers moved across the city. These rains have brought much-needed relief from the recent high temperatures. The IMD forecasts further rain or thunderstorms, including lightning and gusty winds of 40-50 km/h, later on Thursday, October 10, with isolated areas of Mumbai expected to be affected in the next few hours. ALSO READ: Ratan Tata's Legacy: A Look At His Family Tree And Unknown Facts Additionally, a yellow alert has been issued for other regions, including Pune, Ratnagiri, Sindhudurg, Dhule, Nashik and Kolhapur, signalling light to moderate rainfall in these areas. Mumbai Weather Forecast The weather outlook for Friday, October 11, suggests partly cloudy skies with a chance of moderate rainfall or thunderstorms. Navi Mumbai, Panvel, Thane and suburban parts of Mumbai are also under thunderstorm warnings. Looking ahead to Saturday, the IMD predicts cloudy skies, especially in the afternoon and evening, with similar weather expected through Sunday. Temperatures are forecasted to hover between 26 degrees Celsius and 34 degrees Celsius. ALSO READ: Ratan Tata...

title: Rhetan TMT Q2 Results: Net Profit Surged 233% YoY To Rs 2.27 Cr; Revenue Stood At Rs 4.94 Cr
content: Latest News Rhetan TMT Limited (Formerly known as Rhetan Rolling Mills Private Limited) a company based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat has declared its financial results for the quarter ended 30th September 2024. The company reported a revenue from operations of Rs 4.94 Cr in Q2FY25 down by 52.77% YoY from Rs 10.46 Cr in the same quarter of the year-ago period. Its net income stood at Rs 4.95 Cr in the quarter under review as against Rs 10.46 Cr in the same quarter of the previous fiscal. The total expenses of Rhetan TMT reached Rs 2.46 Cr in Q2FY25 down by 74.84% YoY from Rs 9.78 Cr in Q2FY24. The net profit of the company stood at Rs 2.27 Cr in the current quarter, up by 233% YoY from Rs 0.68 Cr in the quarter ended in September 2023. On March 31, 2024, the company became public on the BSE SME Platform, and then on May 6, 2024, it migrated to the BSE Main Board. The development of a solar power plant with a capacity of up to 2 MW was approved by the Board of Directors on Friday, September 20, the previous month. This facility will be located in the Taluka Bayad, District Aravalli, the village of Untarda, and it will occupy around 20,000 square meters. The TMT Bars company in Kadi, Gujarat, has a solar power plant that is especially intended for captive use. A Letter of Intent (LOI) has already been completed to start this project. In order to get the required permissions, the company will go forward with submitting an application to the Gujarat Energy Development Agency (GEDA)....

title: Knicks Roll In Second Preseason Contest, 117-94
content: The New York Knicks don't begin their regular season for another two weeks. Through the first two games of the preseason, it looks like the entire roster is ready for the season to end two weeks ahead of time. © Brad Penner-Imagn Images Led by 48 combined points from Jalen Brunson and Karl-Anthony Towns, the Knicks dominated the lowly Washington Wizards at home by a 117-94 final score. New York used a 35-17 second-quarter stretch to jump ahead in the contest thanks to the top play from Towns and Brunson. The former Minnesota Timberwolf struggled from the field but ended with 25 points and 12 rebounds in the win. The Knicks also combined for 29 points off the bench from Cameron Payne and second-round rookie Tyler Kolek. One notable absence from New York was Miles McBride. The young guard is dealing with an illness and kept him off the court for the team's preseason contest. Related: Knicks Look to Cease Wizards' Magic New York also had a positive turnover differential with forcing 16 off the Wizards while only turning the ball over nine times. Alex Sarr led Washington with 14 points, but the Knicks were able to keep their opposing starting lineup inefficient. At 2-0, the Knicks have played well to this point in the preseason.

title: Coming undone: The IOA’s infighting threatens to ruin the country’s recent sporting achievements
creator: Abhijit Nair
content: This article originally appeared in The Field’s newsletter, Game Points , on October 9, 2024. Sign up here to get the newsletter directly delivered to your inbox every week. Sports administration in India has always been a messy affair. Infighting between board or council members backed by rival political powers is fairly routine. Yet, things have never seemed as ugly as they currently are with the Indian Olympic Association – the country’s top most Olympic sports body. When PT Usha – one of the pioneers for Indian athletics on the global stage – was elected unopposed as the Indian Olympic Association president in December 2022, it was hailed as a watershed moment for Indian sports. Not only was she the first woman to helm the IOA, but she was also the first Olympian to be elevated to the position. The country had long wanted an athlete to head sports administration and Usha’s reign as the IOA chief was expected to turn a new leaf in Indian sporting history. But 22 months in, that tenure has been riddled with bickering and chaos. Over the last few months, there has been a public fallout between president Usha and the IOA executive council members – a body that includes seasoned administrators and former athletes. Typically, all differences are solved behind closed doors. But the latest fiasco, with Usha in the centre, has spilled out in the open. It has even started hurting top athletes. This is best seen in the case of skier Arif Khan, whose funds for the 2026 Winter...

title: Sandra Dewi Jadi Saksi Kasus Korupsi Timah Suaminya Harvey Moeis, Soal Uang Rp10 M yang Ditransfer
Former NFL GM Predicts Aaron Rodgers Will Soon Be Paired with Superstar WR
content: It hasn't been quite the year many New York Jets fans were hoping for through five weeks. With quarterback Aaron Rodgers back after tearing his Achilles just a few plays into 2023, many expected the Jets offense to take a big leap forward this season. Instead, New York's offense ranks just 27th in total yards per game (286.6). Still, this has been a step up from the Zach Wilson-led offense a year ago that averaged 268.6 yards per game. The Jets now sit at 2-3 on the season and are looking for answers. They recently relieved head coach Robert Saleh of his duties, but that might not fix their problems. However, former Minnesota Vikings general manager Jeff Diamond of the 33rd Team thinks he may have a solution for some of New York's issues. Diamond predicts that the Jets will land Las Vegas Raiders wide receiver Davante Adams in exchange for a second-day draft pick by the Nov. 5 trade deadline. "I expect [Jets GM Joe Douglas] to send the Raiders a second or third-round pick for the 31-year-old Adams, who has caught more than 100 passes in the past four seasons in Green Bay and Las Vegas," Diamond wrote. Kirby Lee-Imagn Images New York is in a position where if they do decide to trade for Adams, they would be able to absorb his $16.89M salary without giving up any significant players. Adams and Rodgers would have immediate chemistry after playing together on the Green Bay Packers for eight years. During that time, Adams made five Pro Bowls and was named a two-time first-team...

title: Detroit's running backs could have another big day vs. Dallas in Week 6
content: It could be yet another big day on the ground for the Detroit Lions running backs against the Dallas Cowboys on Sunday at AT&T Stadium. David Montgomery and Jahmyr Gibbs have already been a problem for NFL defenses this season and have excelled when teams aren't at full strength, especially on the defensive line. A prime example of that was in Week 4 against the Seattle Seahawks, when the Lions went up against a defensive front that was without the services of Byron Murphy II, Leonard Williams, Boye Mafe and Uchenna Nwosu. Follow us on Facebook Related: Lions light up Seahawks on 'MNF' in 42-29 victory While quarterback Jared Goff and the Lions passing offense played exceptionally well, the talented offensive line made work of the Seahawks' holes on defense and Gibbs and Montgomery combined for 118 yards on 26 carries and three touchdowns. Cowboys defensive coordinator Mike Zimmer has already shared his thoughts on his banged up defense and the troubles it will bring on Sunday. Dallas is without DeMarcus Lawrence and Durrell Johnson as both are on the injured reserve and they may also be without Micah Parsons (ankle) and Marshawn Kneeland (knee). "Obviously, you're losing four good players at basically one spot (edge)," Zimmer told reporters on Wednesday. "You try to figure out what these (other) guys can do best, how they can fit in?" The Lions are averaging 151 yards per game and Dallas ranks 24th overall in run defense. Zimmer shared his thoughts on not only Gibbs and...

title: "On ne sait pas où on va, vous non plus" : les agriculteurs du Vaucluse bâchent les panneaux indicateurs
content: " On ne sait pas où on va, vous non plus " : les agriculteurs ont bâché hier soir des panneaux à l'entrée de plusieurs communes du Vaucluse, comme Valréas, Pernes les fontaines, ou encore Orange. L'action est soutenue par les syndicats FDSEA et Jeunes Agriculteurs du Vaucluse. Après les manifestations et les blocages du début d'année, la colère agricole reste très vive . Le président des Jeunes Agriculteurs du Vaucluse Jordan Charransol assure que " les trésoreries sont encore plus vides que l'an dernier, et les exploitations vont encore plus mal. On a eu des beaux discours au printemps, mais c'est tout ". Promesses non tenues Selon les syndicats, le problème de concurrence persiste avec les autres pays de l'Union Européenne. L'Italie, par exemple, autorise des insecticides interdits en France mais ses navets sont tout de même importés et vendus moins cher. Même chose avec les fraises du Maroc ou d'Espagne. Concernant la simplification des démarches administratives , " on en est très loin ", affirment les syndicats. Et certaines exploitations n'ont toujours pas reçu les aides de la PAC , la politique agricole commune. Seule promesse tenue, selon les agriculteurs : le gouvernement a renoncé à la hausse de la taxe sur le gazole non routier utilisé pour les engins agricoles. Les agriculteurs du Vaucluse prévoient de nouvelles mobilisations si les choses ne bougent pas.

title: MLB Announcer's Horrendous Call During Yankees-Royals Draws Criticism
content: The New York Yankees took on the Kansas City Royals at Kauffman Stadium for Game 3 of the ALDS series on Oct. 9. While it looked like the Royals may come out on top after second-baseman Michael Massey tied the score 2-2 in the fifth inning, Yankees star Giancarlo Stanton's homer to left center ultimately gave New York the 3-2 win. The energy at Kauffman Stadium was electric during the playoff game, with the Royals playing in their first postseason since winning the World Series in 2015. Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes was in attendance, along with his wife, Brittany Mahomes, and brother Jackson Mahomes. However, the crowd watching at home lost their patience with Bob Costas, who delivered the play-by-play for the TBS broadcast. During the eighth inning, a wrong play call by Costas drew intense criticism. “Line drive base hit to center field!” -Bob Costas pic.twitter.com/UenniNg8z6 While Costas said, "Line drive base hit to center field!” the ball was caught for an easy out. "It was smothered out there. I don't even know if it was caught!" he added, before his co-host simply replied, "It was caught." One fan commented , "Guy needs to be retired. Absolutely disgraceful." Another person posted , "Hard to be this bad." A viewer wrote , "The fact that I had to endure this in this moment is beyond inexplicable." One Yankees fan compared the comment to Donald Trump's false claim during the presidential debate and wrote , "This Bob Costas moment is the they're eating...

title: Hôm nay công bố giải Nobel Văn học
content: Giáo sư Mats Malm - thư ký thường trực của Viện Hàn lâm Thụy Điển - sẽ công bố người chiến thắng ở buổi họp báo vinh danh tác giả. Người chiến thắng nhận phần thưởng 11 triệu krona Thụy Điển (hơn 26 tỷ đồng). Nhà văn Trung Quốc Tàn Tuyết là cái tên được các nhà phê bình, độc giả thế giới nhắc đến nhiều, dự đoán bà thắng giải. Theo Guardian : "Tác giả Gerald Murnane và César Aira rất được quan tâm, nhưng Tàn Tuyết vẫn là lựa chọn phổ biến nhất". Nếu thắng, bà sẽ là người phụ nữ thứ 18 được vinh danh. Tác giả 71 tuổi, tên thật là Đặng Tiểu Hoa, sinh ở tỉnh Hồ Nam, là gương mặt tiêu biểu của văn học đương đại, được mệnh danh là "Kafka của Trung Quốc". Các tác phẩm tiêu biểu của bà gồm Phố Ngũ Hương, Hoàng Nê Phố, Mây cũ trôi về. Tác giả nổi tiếng ở Nhật Bản, Mỹ và nhiều nước phương Tây. Ngoài Tàn Tuyết, một số cái tên quen thuộc được cho là sẽ đoạt Nobel gồm Gerald Murnane (Australia), César Aira (Argentina), Margaret Atwood (Canada). Năm ngoái, tác giả Na Uy Jon Fosse, nhà văn khá xa lạ với độc giả châu Á, chiến thắng . Haruki Murakami , nhà văn ăn khách nổi tiếng người Nhật Bản, tiếp tục có mặt ở nhiều danh sách dự đoán. Trang Time On của Ấn Độ bình luận: "Dù liên tục được...

title: Red Raiders Finish Sixth in Big 12 Match Play Tournament
content: After an impressive Monday that saw the Texas Tech men's golf team go undefeated and a less impressive Tuesday, the Red Raiders qualified for the fifth-place match on Wednesday morning. Unfortunately, the struggles from Tuesday held over and the Red Raiders fell 1-2-2 in match play on Wednesday to the Oklahoma State Cowboys at the Big 12 Match Play Tournament at Houston Oaks Country Club. USA TODAY Sports That loss puts Texas Tech's finish in sixth place. The Red Raiders posted wins over the Baylor Bears, the Cincinnati Bearcats and the TCU Horned Frogs and lost to the Colorado Buffaloes and Oklahoma State. Senior golfer Callum Scott earned his team's only point in the Texas Tech loss to the Cowboys on Wednesday. Scott finished three holes up with two to play for the Red Raiders' second team win across the tournament. Freshman Sean Keeling and senior Charlie DeLong both tied their respective matches against Oklahoma State. Keeling hit a clutch birdie to win his final hole to secure the tie, while DeLong trailed by as many as two holes after 13 to come back and tie. Freshman Connor Graham dropped his second consecutive match after winning the first three he played. He led by as many as three holes over the first nine, but couldn't hang on during a tough back nine. title: México asegura lugar en Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU
creator: Rafael López Méndez
content: México fue electo para formar parte del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la Organización de las Naciones Unidas (ONU) para el periodo 2025-2027. El nombramiento se realizó en el marco de la 79a Asamblea General de la ONU y marca un nuevo capítulo en el compromiso del país con la defensa de los derechos humanos en la arena internacional, de acuerdo con la dependencia. Te recomendamos Senado aprueba convocatoria para elección de nuevo titular de la CNDH Política Entre las prioridades que México se ha fijado para su tiempo en el Consejo están la promoción de los derechos de las mujeres y la igualdad de género , pilares fundamentales de la llamada Política Exterior Feminista. Asimismo, el país se centrará en los derechos de los pueblos indígenas, las personas migrantes y aquellas con discapacidad; tres sectores que históricamente han estado en el margen de los debates globales. “México agradece a la comunidad su confianza y reitera su compromiso con la defensa y promoción de los derechos humanos, en línea con los principios constitucionales de política exterior”, informó la SRE en un comunicado difundido a través de redes sociales. ????
