Tornados por 'Milton' dejan muertos en comunidad de adultos mayores de Florida
creator: Agencia EFE
content: Varias personas murieron en una comunidad que alberga a adultos mayores en el condado de St. Lucie, Florida , después de que un tornado generado por las condiciones del huracán Milton , arrasara sus viviendas, confirmaron las autoridades a medios locales. El Departamento del Alguacil del condado de St.Lucie aseguró al canal WPTV que ocurrieron "múltiples muertes" en el Spanish Lakes Country Club , donde residen personas retiradas de la tercera edad. Te recomendamos Huracán 'Milton' toca tierra en Florida | Trayectoria y estados afectados en México y EU HOY 9 de octubre EN VIVO Internacional El alguacil en jefe de St.Lucie, Keith Pearson , dijo que no está claro cuántas personas fallecieron y que los equipos de emergencia han desplegado una operación de búsqueda y rescate en cada una de las viviendas afectadas, antes de que lleguen las lluvias de Milton . "Tenemos docenas de casas en el condado de St. Lucie que han sido dañadas, algunas de ellas con afectaciones catastróficas", dijo el portavoz del condado de St. Lucie, Erick Gill, al canal WFLA . El principal objetivo de los operativos es ayudar a los sobrevivientes y evaluar los daños. Florida, a pendiente de 19 tornados este miércoles Al menos 19 tornados se registraron en el centro y sur de Florida este miércoles, horas antes de que el huracán Milton tocara tierra en Siesta Key, en la costa oeste de Florida, Estados Unidos. En una rueda de prensa ofrecida esta noche, el gobernador de Florida , Ron DeSantis...

title: Stocks begin flirting with 86,000 milestone
creator: none@none.com (Muhammad Kashif)
content: KARACHI: The stock market on Wednesday continued its winning streak for the seventh straight session on higher remittances, briefly crossing 86,000 intraday on easing political tensions and specula-tions of robust corporate earnings. However, despite aggre­ssive foreign selling, the index scaled an all-time high with meagre gains. Ahsan Mehanti of Arif Habib Corporation said stocks hit a new high aided by banking scrips after the State Bank of Pakistan revised per-party exposure limits for small and medium enterprises and 29pc year-on-year increase to $2.8bn in September. He said the market witnessed a midsession selling on falling global crude oil prices and foreign outflows. Topline Securities Ltd said the KSE-100 index experienced significant volatility, peaking at 86,451 and dipping to 85,444, mainly due to profit-taking and the in­­dex’s inability to sustain gains above 86,000. How­ever, institutional buying supported the index for positive closing. As a result, the benchmark index posted a moderate gain of 5.3 points to close at 85,669.28. Key contributors to the index included MCB Bank, Lucky Core Indus­tries, Bank Al-Habib, Hub Power, and Habib Bank, which collectively added 292 points. Conversely, Fauji Ferti­liser, Engro Fertiliser, and Pakistan Oilfield shaved off 215 points. The trading volume was up 17.66 per cent to 596.05 million shares. However, the traded value fell 5.17pc to Rs31.34bn day-on-day. Stocks contributing significantly to the traded volume...

title: CNE sí tiene competencia para investigar campaña de Petro, ratifica el Consejo de Estado
More than 1 million without power as Hurricane Milton slams Florida
creator: Irishexaminer.com
content: Hurricane Milton crashed into Florida as a Category 3 storm on Wednesday, pounding the coast with ferocious winds of more than 100mph (160kph) and producing a series of tornadoes around the state. The cyclone had maximum sustained winds of 120mph (205kph) as it roared ashore 8.30pm local time near Siesta Key, the Miami-based National Hurricane Centre said. Siesta Key is a prosperous strip of white-sand beaches that is home to 5,500 people about 70 miles (112 kilometres) south of Tampa Bay, which avoided a direct hit. The Tampa Bay area has not taken a direct hit from a major hurricane in more than a century, but the storm was still bringing a potentially deadly storm surge to much of Florida’s Gulf Coast, including densely populated areas such as Tampa, St. Petersburg, Sarasota and Fort Myers. Heavy rains were also likely to cause flooding inland along rivers and lakes as Milton traverses the Florida peninsula as a hurricane, eventually to emerge in the Atlantic Ocean on Thursday. Flash Flood Emergency continues for Tampa FL, Saint Petersburg FL and Clearwater FL until 2:30 AM EDT pic.twitter.com/w2KDHMQKpp More than 1 million homes and businesses were without power on Wednesday night in Florida, according to poweroutage.us, which tracks utility reports. The highest number of outages were in Sarasota County and neighbouring Manatee County. About 125 homes were destroyed before the hurricane even made landfall, many of them mobile homes in communities for senior citizens,...

title: La inflación repunta en Brasil por la sequía: cerró en 4,42% interanual
content: La inflación en Brasil , la mayor economía de América Latina, se situó en septiembre en el 4,42% interanual , 0,18 puntos más con respecto a agosto, presionada por el alza de la electricidad y los alimentos como consecuencia de la sequía. El Índice Nacional de Precios al Consumidor Amplio (IPCA) registró un alza del 0,44% en septiembre , después de que en agosto retrocediera un 0,02%, en el que fue su primer resultado negativo desde junio de 2023, según el Instituto Brasileño de Geografía y Estadística (IBGE) . (Lea: Huracán Milton toca tierra en el estado de Florida: este es el balance ). El principal elemento que influyó fue la factura de la luz en los hogares, que avanzó un 5,36 % en septiembre , como consecuencia de la intensa sequía que sufre más de la mitad del país y que ha causado un descenso agudo del nivel de los embalses. (Además: Potencias militares: cuáles son los 15 ejércitos más poderosos del mundo ). Los alimentos también subieron un 0,5%, tras dos meses seguidos de caídas , impactados por el alza de la carne bovina y algunas frutas, como la naranja, el limón y la papaya. “ La fuerte sequía y el clima seco contribuyeron en la disminución de la oferta ”, explicó el IBGE. (Le puede interesar: Huracán Milton: la dura decisión de Disney y sus parques temáticos ). Los analistas calculan que la inflación cerrará el año en Brasil en el 4,38% , por debajo del techo de la meta, que es del 4,5%. Sin embargo, el Banco Central,...

title: Report: The Bills Are 'Monitoring' Blockbuster Trade Option
content: The NFL trade deadline is about a month away, but teams are assessing their rosters and preparing for potential moves. Some of the league's contenders will look to get better, while the teams near the bottom of the standings will look to move players for draft capital instead of letting them walk in free agency. One team that could look to make a splash at the deadline? The Buffalo Bills. The Bills were surrounded by uncertainty after trading Pro Bowl wide receiver Stefon Diggs to the Houston Texans, but they've been among the best teams in the AFC so far this season. Quarterback Josh Allen has arguably played at an MVP level through the first five weeks of the year, and the Bills are reportedly looking at a top option on the trade market to help him. According to The Athletic, the Bills are "monitoring" the Davante Adams situation along with the front runners, the Jets, Steelers and Saints. The Dallas Cowboys, Baltimore Ravens and Kansas City Chiefs have all reportedly dropped out of the trade market for Adams, who reportedly prefers to play with a quarterback he has experience with. Jeff Bottari/Getty Images Allen wouldn't fit that criteria, but it would be hard to turn down a chance to play with one of the best quarterbacks in the league. The Raiders would reportedly prefer a second-round pick in return for Adams, and in order to receive that, they would likely need to pay a portion of his remaining salary. If they don't trade him, he'll be owed the full extent of his...

title: Spurs Overpower Magic
content: The San Antonio Spurs won their second preseason game of the year, beating the Orlando Magic 107-97. The Spurs were one-point favorites, although they scratched Tre Jones and Keldon Johnson from the lineup right before tipoff. All eyes were on Victor Wembanyama, who made his preseason debut for the Spurs after missing the first game against the Oklahoma City Thunder. Wembanyama suited up next to Chris Paul and showed plenty of promise , as Wembanyama racked up 11 points, nine rebounds, four assists, and zero blocks. In his first game as a Spur, Paul posted five points and three assists in 23 minutes. Scott Wachter-Imagn Images Orlando was led by Jett Howard, who scored 19 points. Paolo Banchero, who is coming off his first All-Star season, added 12 points in 17 minutes. Orlando lost their first preseason game, falling to the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday. While Wembanyama and Paul stole the show, rookie Stephon Castle continued to show flashes of excellence. He followed up his five-point, six-turnover effort against the Thunder with 17 points and four assists while shooting 2-5 from three. In the first preseason game for the Spurs, Sandro Mamukelashvili, Riley Minix, and Julian Champagnie all shot well from deep, and in the win against Orlando, Champagnie led the Spurs' shooting effort, making 4-10 shots and finishing with 12 points. The Spurs have been making outside shooting a focal point of their offense this season, which makes sense, given that Wembanyama is the anchor...

title: Angel Reese's Posts First Look at Injured Hand After Major Update
content: Angel Reese's recovery is going well, with the Chicago Sky rookie announcing on Wednesday that the hard cast on her left hand has been removed. Naturally, the young forward was excited about the development. Later in the day, Reese made sure to show her fans how her left hand looks after four weeks of being in a hand cast. She uploaded a couple of photos on her Instagram Stories, with one featuring her nails on her left hand done and the other showing her carrying a bag. For those who have been following Reese religiously, it is worth noting that Reese had been hiding her hand cast behind her bags whenever she took photos for social media. Angel Reese showing her left hand after her hand brace was removed pic.twitter.com/omyycineTE Sure enough, Angel Reese is pretty happy that she no longer needs to hide her hand cast. The Sky All-Star sustained a fracture in her left wrist late in the 2024 WNBA season. The injury required surgery, forcing her to miss the final six games of the campaign. Reese is very well within her injury timeline. Before she underwent surgery, she said that she would be in a hard cast for four weeks. After that, she's set to wear a soft cast for another two weeks before she gets back to her normal routine. © Kamil Krzaczynski-Imagn Images There appears to be no setback in Reese's recovery, which should delight the Sky faithful. Related: Angel Reese's Injury Post Is Turning Heads

title: Toss Securities Announces Appointment of Gyubin Kim as New CEO
creator: By Toss Securities
content: SEOUL, South Korea , Oct. 9, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Toss Securities announced today that Gyubin Kim, the former Head of Product, has been appointed as the new CEO. The decision, made during a general shareholders' meeting on the 10th, is part of a strategy to bolster Toss Securities' standing as an investment platform and broaden its range of services. Kim has been instrumental in driving service innovation since joining Toss Securities as a Product Owner (PO) in January 2022 . His accomplishments include launching real-time fractional overseas stock trading and enhancing the investor community. Kim also contributed to the company's first quarterly profit in 2023. He has laid the groundwork for Toss Securities services, such as launching overseas bonds, diversifying products, and introducing Toss Securities PC (Web Trading System). Prior to joining Toss Securities, Kim honed his tech-based service planning skills at Toss ( Viva Republica ) and eBay Korea. Following the recent executive appointments, Dongwan Ko , former PO, has assumed the position of the new Head of Product. Since joining Toss Securities, Ko has contributed in spearheading the company's growth in overseas stock services. Toss Securities, which began as an easy-to-use mobile stock trading service in March 2021 , has grown into a brokerage firm with 6.3 million customers as of September 2024 . The company has expanded its scope to cater not only to novice investors but also to professional investors. Focused on...

content: Accede a todas nuestras historias sobre el proceso eleccionario en Decisión 2024 . title: Новые люди в старом Офисе. Кто и чем теперь занимается на Банковой
creator: Украинская правда
content: "О, людей нових багато прийшло. Але вони не те, щоб дуже нові", – сміючись, розмірковує співрозмовник "Української правди" з команди Володимира Зеленського про оновлення команди Офісу президента. На початку вересня 2024-го вся країна спостерігала завершення історії під назвою "велике перезавантаження" влади , коли Кабінет міністрів Дениса Шмигаля зазнав оновлення більш як на 50%. Не менш відчутні зміни тоді ж сталися і на Банковій. Чотири з десяти заступників глави ОП Андрія Єрмака втратили посади. Ще три чиновники з-поза Офісу отримали там місця. Таких масштабних перестановок в Офісі не переживали аж із часів "дебогданізації" і початку епохи Єрмака. Однак, як точно підмітив співрозмовник УП, нові люди навіть при позверхньому огляді виявляються не такими вже й новими. Кадрова політика чинної влади все більше підлягає закону сполучених посудин, коли будь-яке оновлення відбувається винятково за рахунок перетікання вмісту з однієї кадрової ємності в іншу. УП вирішила з'ясувати, хто кого замінив у команді Зеленського, що нового відбувається в роботі ОПУ після звільнень та призначень, та хто під'юджує президента на відкриту конфронтацію з незалежними медіа. Відставки серед "командного складу" ОП були частиною ширшого процесу змін у владі. Але кожна з них мала свою окрему історію. Заступник глави Офісу з питань економіки Ростислав Шурма , попри численні чутки про його можливі підвищення чи перехід в уряд, несподівано для багатьох звільнився з Банкової і не отримав...

title: Cruz Azul, el equipo que más jugadores aportó a las selecciones en esta fecha FIFA
creator: Violeta Alva
content: El gran momento que vive Cruz Azul este 2024 se ha visto reflejado en el llamado de varios de sus jugadores a las distintas selecciones nacionales. El conjunto celeste es en esta fecha FIFA el equipo que más elementos aporta a los combinados nacionales, ya sea de México o del extranjero, con 11 jugadores en total. Por parte de Javier Aguirre a la selección mayor fueron llamados Jorge Sánchez , Luis Romo , Carlos Rodríguez y Erik Lira . Para la categoría Sub 23 fue convocado Andrés Montaño , un jugador que incluso no suele ser titular con Martín Anselmi, pero cuando el estratega celeste lo ha necesitado ha entrado al quite. Además, en la Sub 20 fueron llamados Mateo Levy y Amaury Morales , lo que indica que también los canteranos celestes están siendo considerados por los estrategas tricolor. Mientras que en la Sub 19 fue considerado el joven Rogelio González . En cuanto a los extranjeros, los colombianos Kevin Mier y Willer Ditta fueron considerados por el estratega Néstor Lorenzo para los duelos de esta fecha FIFA dentro de las Eliminatorias de la Conmebol, en los que el conjunto cafetalero se medirá a Bolivia y Chile, este jueves y el próximo martes, respectivamente. Tanto el guardameta como el zaguero celestes han tenido grandes actuaciones desde su arribo a La Máquina y se han convertido en piezas claves en el gran momento que vive el conjunto mexicano. Éste es el cuarto llamado para el guardameta, luego de que agosto pasado fuera llamado por su...

title: NBA Fans Saddened by Victor Oladipo News
content: Former NBA star Victor Oladipo has started a new venture in his career as an analyst for ESPN, but rather than celebrating the new chapter, many fans are met with sadness at what could have been. Oladipo started in his analyst role on Wednesday night during preseason action on ESPN, and he looked comfortable in his role. However, after seeing the promise that his NBA career brought, most notably with the Orlando Magic and Indiana Pacers, it was unfortunate to see it ended by injuries. Oladipo missed 255 of 374 games since 2019 due to knee injuries, tearing his right quad multiple times and then suffering a torn patellar tendon in his left knee in 2023. Before injuries derailed his career, Oladipo was a two-time NBA All-Star, Third-Team All-NBA player, All-Defensive First-Team player, and the NBA's Most Improved player in 2018. © Sam Navarro-Imagn Images NBA fans were happy to see Oladipo on ESPN, but couldn't help but feel saddened about where his career ended up. title: La virtud no sólo es para las artes, sino también para el liderazgo: Felipe Gómez
creator: Yeshua Ordaz
content: El director de diferentes empresas y startups, Felipe Gómez, explicó durante el foro Business Masters Live 2024 , que la virtud sólo se atribuye a los artistas, como músicos, y se deja de lado el mundo corporativo, pero es una cualidad de todos los líderes. En su conferencia "Virtuoso", durante dicho foro, Felipe Gómez destacó que todos estamos llamados a actuar de forma extraordinaria, intentando ser virtuosos en lo que hacemos. "Pero nunca se ha utilizado esta palabra en un entorno corporativo", aseguró. El conferencista explicó que l a virtud es un hábito operativo bueno, hacer las cosas de manera bien y de manera correcta, por lo que remarcó que la virtuosidad en la música y la gestión (o liderazgo) tienen mucho en común. Te recomendamos Estos son los riesgos de comprar artículos navideños chinos y en el mercado gris Negocios "Todos los músicos virtuosos tienen tanto que enseñarle a los hombres de negocios, existen tres condiciones para alcanzar el liderazgo virtuoso" afirmó. Características de la virtud Felipe Gómez comparó el camino del liderazgo con el de un aspirante a virtuoso y las tres condiciones por las que se rige para desarrollar su potencial: método, actitud y pasión. Sobre el método, dijo que es " aplicar el rigor y la disciplina para perfeccionar su oficio". La actitud, "asumir el enfoque correcto para crear una conexión con el público (en el caso corporativo, clientes o inversionistas)". La pasión que "ayudará a marcar la...

title: ‘Thought it was a death sentence’: Fergie shares sombre cancer update
content: Sarah Ferguson has revealed there has been "no spread or recurrence" of either breast or skin cancer over a year after the lifechanging double diagnosis. Ferguson, 64, underwent a single mastectomy and reconstructive surgery in June last year for breast cancer and later revealed her prognosis was “good”. In a cruel twist, Fergie’s breast cancer diagnosis was followed by a skin cancer diagnosis months later after doctors discovered malignant melanoma, which was also successfully treated. “With the love and support of my family, especially my girls Beatrice and Eugenie, I have stayed positive and been informed that my outlook is good,” she told The Sun newspaper on Wednesday. Ferguson said she initially thought “my cancer was a death sentence” after undergoing a mammogram at the urging of her older sister Jane Ferguson which confirmed the disease. “It has been a difficult period, and I’m not out of the woods,” Ferguson said. “I underwent a single mastectomy and a breast reconstruction operation, while my malignant melanoma and surrounding area was removed and other moles checked for cancer.” The former working royal, who divorced Prince Andrew in 1996 but continues to live with her ex-husband at Royal Lodge, also revealed why she believes she suffered skin cancer. “I’m sure it was caused by my exposure to the sun as a fair-skinned child in the 1970s, when no one knew about the importance of sun cream,” she said. “One cancer diagnosis is bad enough but two in quick succession...

title: Stanton hits go-ahead homer, Yankees beat Royals 3-2 in Game 3 of the ALDS
creator: Dave Skretta The Associated Press
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. (AP) — Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning amid a battle of bullpens, and the New York Yankees beat the Kansas City Royals 3-2 on Wednesday night in Game 3 of their AL Division Series at Kauffman Stadium. Stanton finished with three hits, drove in two runs and stole a base for the first time in four years for the Yankees, who will turn to with a chance to reach . “We need to wrap it up tomorrow. No wiggle room,” Stanton said. “We’ve got to get it done.” In a game dominated by pitching, the Royals used four relievers before starter-turned-bullpen ace Kris Bubic took over for the eighth. He struck out Austin Wells before Stanton hit a 3-1 pitch nearly 420 feet to left field to give New York the lead. “He’s done it throughout his career with us,” Yankees manager Aaron Boone said. “I thought that at-bat off Bubic was just phenomenal. I think he went up there looking to do damage, looking to do just that.” The Royals tried to answer off Luke Weaver in the bottom of the eighth, getting and a two-out single by franchise stalwart Salvador Perez. But the unflappable Weaver recovered to get Yuli Gurriel to fly out, then he took care of the ninth to earn the save and cap 4 1/3 scoreless innings by the New York bullpen. Yankees relievers have not allowed an earned run in 13 2/3 innings this post-season. “I think that’s been one of our strengths, if not our main strength, the whole year,” Yankees starter Clarke Schmidt said.
